<o:p></o:p></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><span style=\"color: purple;\">It prefers to say to\nits followers, \"This is the nature of Truth, and these are the means by\nwhich that Truth may be realized. Here are the traditions which have withstood\ntime and proved most effective. Now you may use your own conscience based\nchoice and test them in your own life, prove them to yourself. And we will help\nas we can.\"&nbsp;</span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><span style=\"color: purple;\">Hinduism will never say, \"You must do or believe &nbsp;or be ex-communicated and condemned.\". </span></b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hinduism would still be the greatest religion on\nthe basis of its profound mysticism, inherent wisdom alone.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">No other faith\nboasts such a deep and enduring comprehension of the mysteries of existence, or\npossesses so vast a metaphysical system.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The storehouse of religious\nrevelations in Hinduism is a bottomless well .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">It contains the entire\nsystem of yoga, of meditation and contemplation and Self Realization. Nowhere\nelse is there such insightful revelation of the inner bodies of man, the subtle\npranas and the chakras, or psychic centers within the nerve system.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-zdjSHSPct1Y/V10UjciuwKI/AAAAAAABJ6M/h8AfwVG9ZT4JIFNDvQhSIPcTxLY6_dEQgCLcB/s1600/soul-insidnne-300x300.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-zdjSHSPct1Y/V10UjciuwKI/AAAAAAABJ6M/h8AfwVG9ZT4JIFNDvQhSIPcTxLY6_dEQgCLcB/s400/soul-insidnne-300x300.png\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Inner\nstates of superconsciousness are explored and mapped fully in Hinduism, from\nthe clear white light to the sights and sounds which flood the awakened inner\nconsciousness of man.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the West it is the mystically awakened soul who is\ndrawn to Hinduism for understanding of inner states of consciousness,\ndiscovering after ardent seeking that Hinduism possesses answers which do not\nexist elsewhere and is capable of guiding awareness into ever-deepening mind\nstrata.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Science is now closer to Vedanta ( not vice versa ) than ever before.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There is nothing termed\nCONVERSION TO HINDUISM<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">All GHAR WAPSI\ncampaigns of the Hindu organizations are controlled from abroad\u2014just to give\nHinduism a bad name.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">To be a Hindu all you\nneed is to use your CONSCIENCE and arrange to CREMATE when you are dead.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is the reason why\nSanatana Dharma has won the battle of religions. &nbsp;It does NOT hold back or restrain anybody.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the Vedas and other\nHindu spiritual texts there are so many eye-opening statements, there is so\nmuch wisdom. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vedas explain\neverything about this cosmos. This is the only text that clearly explains the\nnature of this reality and the reason for it.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is the reason why\nthere is hardly any aggression and hatred in Hindu people than in the people of\nother religions <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">NEVER MIND FOUL ULTA\nPROPAGANDA ( SAFFRON TERROR ) BY BENAMI MEDIA.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">HINDUS HAVE RIOTED ONLY AS A REACTION , AND\nNEVER A PROACTIVE ACTION<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Most Hindu people live\nin peace with nature and accept their circumstances. Hindu people care less\nabout materialistic things.&nbsp; In Hinduism\nwe have got the freedom to speak and object.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-T6MUUB90a-o/V10rcrs0lAI/AAAAAAABJ7o/Sc6NP0Gt1JEfDNZTxnwJZRIVTp_tzSDSQCLcB/s1600/11325936_158395565520586466_2110190080_n.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-T6MUUB90a-o/V10rcrs0lAI/AAAAAAABJ7o/Sc6NP0Gt1JEfDNZTxnwJZRIVTp_tzSDSQCLcB/s1600/11325936_158395565520586466_2110190080_n.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">India as the\n\"cradle of spirituality, \" and Sanatana Dharma as the \"mother of\nall religions, \" has influenced every major religion and nation .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-pViQTQLnmqI/V10o7kaXKfI/AAAAAAABJ7M/5uSevmDA8GUTPWGfbCBXbEaIyCVJtG4qgCLcB/s1600/imdages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-pViQTQLnmqI/V10o7kaXKfI/AAAAAAABJ7M/5uSevmDA8GUTPWGfbCBXbEaIyCVJtG4qgCLcB/s400/imdages.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Hindu believes in\nreincarnation. He believes that he is not the body in which he lives, but the\nsoul &nbsp;which takes on a body for a\ndefinite purpose.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-vtDwxWSindk/V10paFmLShI/AAAAAAABJ7Y/hL72dFruj8QbyHthEM1ZyYCLem6b6mkmgCLcB/s1600/imffag6es.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He believes he is going to get a better body in a better\nbirth, if his karmic baggage is less heavier.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Basically this boils down to his\nsoul frequency\u2014as his karmic baggage becomes less his soul frequency becomes higher\n, affecting his chakras and auras.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-OxGei0Yd4oY/V10oiTUIXeI/AAAAAAABJ7E/rqsVf2m3jdo-t8hN8WQGjCMVVwWrCx2ewCLcB/s1600/imffages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The west ridiculed the\ntheory of&nbsp; karma ,&nbsp; reincarnation and moksha. Not any more. Today\nalmost all of them even if belonging to different faiths have started\nrespecting the endless soul journey till moksha.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This belief in more\nthan a single life and that too own own terms and choice brings to the Hindu a\ngreat sense of peace.&nbsp;&nbsp; He knows that the\nmaturity of the soul takes many lives, perhaps hundreds of lives.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If he is not\nperfect right now, then at least he knows that he is progressing, that there\nwill be many opportunities for learning and growing. This eliminates anxiety,\nbestows HOPE and gives the serene perception that&nbsp; everything will soon click in place.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There is no sense of a\ntime limit, of an impending end or an ultimate judgment of his actions and attitudes.\nThis understanding that the soul evolves gives the Hindu remarkable insight\ninto the human condition and appreciation for all men in all stages of\nspiritual development.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\">Below: After </b><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">Dec 21st 2012</b><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\">, it is easier for the soul to increase its vibrations.</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><br /></b></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"270\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-E37-5LLH5Oo/V10xISXmPqI/AAAAAAABJ8s/NcBdT24Xj0swq9rzNB35FLFJ5BmLByFxwCLcB/s640/kalki-avatar-thett-tenth-and-final-incarnation-of-lord-vishnu.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The charm of Hinduism\nis that it does not demand of every soul perfection in this life, a necessary\nconclusion for those who believe in a single lifetime during which human\nperfection or grace must be achieved before the hour of judgement.&nbsp; &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">People who made inadvertent\nmistakes ( soul samskara caused ) are given HOPE.&nbsp; &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">At\nsea, I tell my crew &nbsp;\u201cI don\u2019t judge you\nby one single mistake. You are allowed to say , I don\u2019t know\u2014I will teach you \u201d&nbsp; You should see the relief on their faces.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The wisdom inherent in\nSanatana Dharma &nbsp;gives birth to a great culture,\na great attitude, a great tolerance and kindness one to another. &nbsp;This is why divorces, rape, crime, unhappiness\nby PERCENTAGE is least in India. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Spirituality gives rise to humility in the\napproach to life--not a weak or hypocritical &nbsp;humility, but a strong and mature sense of the\ngrand presence and purpose of life before which the head naturally bows.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c4665508617918175346\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">I DID NOT ALLOW MY 20/ 20 HINDSIGHT AFFECT THE JUDICIAL PROCESS .</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hindu temples are not\ncentered around a priest or minister.. There is no sermon, no mediator, no\ndirector to guide the worship of pilgrims.&nbsp;\nThe temple is the home of the Deities, and each devotee goes according\nto his own timing and for his own particular needs.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">One has only to attend a\nHindu temple during festival days to capture the great energy and vitality of\nthis ancient religion. Our festivals are rip-roaring events exuding great joy.\nAGAMA self flagellation was started by the FAKE Tamil mutts of Jew Rothschild.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hinduism has influenced\nthe deep philosophical thinkers of all cultures through known history. Every\nphilosophy on the planet has been influenced by Sanatana Dharma.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There is not a single\nphilosophy which can be labeled \"Hinduism.\" Rather, it is a network\nof many philosophies, some seeming to impertinently contradict the validity of\nothers, yet on deeper reflection are seen as integral aspects of a single,\nradiant mind flow.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the area of philosophy must be included the enormous\narray of scripture, hymns, mantras, devotional bhajana and philosophical texts\nwhich are certainly unequaled in the world.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hinduism has shown the\nworld the ideal relationship between a teacher and his student.&nbsp; The guru, a true mentor, had the ethos and\nthe capability to enliven the spirit within his students .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Guru did NOT treat\nhis student\u2019s mind as a vessel to be filled up, rather he treated it as a STACK\nTO BE IGNITED.&nbsp;&nbsp; The mentor MOULDS\nATTITUDES and HONES COMMITMENT.&nbsp;&nbsp; He is\nNO ordinary teacher who can address only knowledge and skills. The guru could CHANGE behavior..&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">the gurukul has a terrific environment usually next to a\nflowing river for the dialogue between minds. In ancient days a guru was\nrespected akin to god.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The student\nknows what his guru is worth \u2013 as the guru could broaden horizons .He enabled\nhis student to solve his own problems. Nothing is forced.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The guru being a spiritual\nman had the capacity to detect emotions and feelings and to respond\nappropriately.&nbsp; Feelings motivate people\nto do or undo things . A guru dies not overlook feelings \u2013he is NOT insensitive\nlike modern professors.&nbsp; The guru\nsupported and enabled rather than restrict and oversee.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">At sea as a captain I\ndid mentoring -- mentoring is an informal relationship outside the chain of\ncommand.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The guru was THE source\nof knowledge, and he was himself the pilgrim's destination.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Toay in Pakistan,\nBangladesh and Kashmir they has destroyed 99% of the temples since 1947.&nbsp; Really it does NOT affect the Hindu mind.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Even if the remaining 1% temples are destroyed, they would spring up again from\nthe seeds of philosophy, or from the presence of a realized man.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">And if all the\nscriptures and philosophical treatises were burned, they would be written again\nfrom the same source. Sanatana Dharma&nbsp;\ncannot be destroyed. It exists as the spirit of religion within each\nbeing, within the Hindu DNA.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is the magic of Hinduism.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-POWL6Rdt55I/V17WzCeGGqI/AAAAAAABJ-Q/Hxc2Q_Yl100dl3qBzJX06imk9-zKajjAACLcB/s1600/indentured-ssslabour-in-South-.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-POWL6Rdt55I/V17WzCeGGqI/AAAAAAABJ-Q/Hxc2Q_Yl100dl3qBzJX06imk9-zKajjAACLcB/s640/indentured-ssslabour-in-South-.jpg\" width=\"548\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When Jew Rothschild\nexported Hindus as slaves abroad \u2013 the Hindus sat together and sang japas and\nderived hope. The white master could snuff out their lives but NOT the inherent\nspirituality.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-be0aPtONlm0/V17XN5OVviI/AAAAAAABJ-c/OQRkz6eDZNEdvmtulELV9w0_917kn_BEACLcB/s1600/imag65es.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-be0aPtONlm0/V17XN5OVviI/AAAAAAABJ-c/OQRkz6eDZNEdvmtulELV9w0_917kn_BEACLcB/s640/imag65es.jpg\" width=\"435\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-cVAktTezcPI/V17Xdy9LeHI/AAAAAAABJ-k/UZ6yDtFRThw0Pto1J7BM7zwusUXa6GPUwCLcB/s1600/indians%2B99in%2Bsvg.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"283\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-cVAktTezcPI/V17Xdy9LeHI/AAAAAAABJ-k/UZ6yDtFRThw0Pto1J7BM7zwusUXa6GPUwCLcB/s400/indians%2B99in%2Bsvg.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/04/indentured-coolie-slavery-reinvented.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/04/indentured-coolie-slavery-reinvented.html</span></a><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-Z0o6HrsxKBw/V17WkRR02VI/AAAAAAABJ-I/lwywm_cSjy0VWH6CMq4Q-Fw2Eyymimk6QCLcB/s1600/East_Indissan_Coolies_in_Trinidad_-_Project_Gutenberg_eText_16035.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-DrmqS09XFx8/V17YM91fkgI/AAAAAAABJ-4/dn0buaWxWsswwNXYvdO2JHM6WQflHdjSgCLcB/s1600/EPCoolieWmoman1.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; font-size: large;\"><b>Below: BR Ambedkar and EVR Periyar wanted British rule to continue.</b></span><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-DkOIp1XnL5A/V17ZGeu5OKI/AAAAAAABJ_E/HOllmI41UZo8CCXJZwwmLv73Aim5hkQEQCLcB/s1600/main-qimg-9ffb7b621b5b25d215f5918833f92a4kkc.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"281\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-DkOIp1XnL5A/V17ZGeu5OKI/AAAAAAABJ_E/HOllmI41UZo8CCXJZwwmLv73Aim5hkQEQCLcB/s640/main-qimg-9ffb7b621b5b25d215f5918833f92a4kkc.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hinduism is. It does\nnot seek to have all devotees believe exactly alike.&nbsp; There is NO imposed uniformity . In fact, it\nhas no central authority, no single organized institution which could ever\nproclaim or enforce such sameness.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There is an immense inner unity, but the\nreal strength and wisdom of Hinduism is its diversity, its variety. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-nzoDEIBGUEM/V17hFgXBcqI/AAAAAAABJ_U/DON5Jk0FoyUlZ7LmIMdovZlciQ1RA3PcwCLcB/s1600/l201208ees2041874.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"424\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-nzoDEIBGUEM/V17hFgXBcqI/AAAAAAABJ_U/DON5Jk0FoyUlZ7LmIMdovZlciQ1RA3PcwCLcB/s640/l201208ees2041874.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hinduism\ndoes NOT believe in forcing all to behave in a uniform manner .</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There are so\nmany sects within Hinduism that you could spend a lifetime studying them and\nnever begin to assess them all.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Hinduism there is no\nperson or mortal spiritual authority who stands between man and his God.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;Nobody can be a spokesman for Sanatana Dharma \u2013\nNOT even the shankaracharya of the four original mutt.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Leave alone these FAKE\nsuper rich gurus ( milking rich devotees ) &nbsp;who set ego laden Guinness book world records, &nbsp;who dye&nbsp; their bears and eyebrows black or silver , who patent yoga, who speak at international free mason seminars, for whom kosher BIG BROTHER has opened out hundreds of foreign branches \u2013 who\ncome on TV and go into a tizzy if they cant grab the limelight every single\nhour.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The job of the temple\npriest if to preserve the sancity and hygiene of the temple. &nbsp;&nbsp;He is NOT allowed to intervene between the\ndevotee and his God.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hindus must know that the greedy Brahmin PANDAS in North\nIndian temples are being controlled by FAKE mutts to grab power.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Without a mediator or a\nbroker or a middleman , responsibility is placed fully upon the individual.\nThere is no one to intercede on his behalf. He is responsible for his actions,\nfor his thoughts, for his emotions, for his relationship with his God.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He must\nwork out his beliefs from the inside, without undue dependence upon external\ninfluences. &nbsp;Of course, there is much\nhelp, as much as may be needed, from those who have previously gone through\nwhat he is now going through.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-E5Rhcb3D8nc/V19hybsRQlI/AAAAAAABJ_s/tWoVqbXmDJAlTNt4uhR2jQL9Ju8jsl-NACLcB/s640/45811_101530741c37662825_8250964806719725453_n.jpg\" width=\"480\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Guruswami has climbed the Pathinettam\nPadi ( 18 steps ) eighteen different times in different years .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Many people have asked\nme \u2013 why 42 days of VRAT for Sabarimala pilgrims and why climb 18 steps?<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Lord Balarama , Krishna\u2019s\nbrother went on a barefooted VRAT pilgrimage for 42 days and came back in time\nto witness the final fight to finish between his students Duryodhan and Bhima .\n<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">When war was imminent between\nthe Kauravas and the Pandavas, Balarama considered himself equally affectionate\ntoward both parties and so decided to side with neither group.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">When Bhima felled\nDuryodhana &nbsp;smashing his groin with his\nheavy mace , Balarama was furious and charged to attack Bhima with his plough, &nbsp;as it went against the rules of engagement .&nbsp;</span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Krishna immediately restrained him stating that Bhima has just fulfilled a vow\nand he was witness to this vow. . In reality &nbsp;Duryodhana\u2019s whole body was invincible due to\nthe boon of Gandhari, except his groin.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">The Kurusketra war (\ngood versus bad ) took 18 days to win. &nbsp;Vishnu\u2019s\nnext avatar after Krishna was Ayyappa ( 9<sup>th</sup> ). <o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Jew Rothschild deleted\nAyyappa and inserted Buddha \u2013 a mere mortal who struggled for salvation. &nbsp;&nbsp;A Vishnu avatar God does NOT require\nsalvation\u2014he dishes out salvation .<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Bhishma was felled on\nthe 10<sup>th</sup> day of battle. &nbsp;&nbsp;But\nas per his boon of Icha mrythyu he laid down on his bed of arrows , till Makara\nSankranti dusk \u2014 this is the exact time you see the 3 flashes at Sabarimala .&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">The flashes are from a\nhomam fire , &nbsp;representing the fire in which\nAmba jumped and did self immolation , after Parashurama failed to subdue his disciple\nBhishma and force him to marry her. &nbsp;</span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">They\nfought for 23 days ( dawn to dusk ) and the finally Parashurama declared a\ndraw.</span></i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span><br />\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c7645149802702820235\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; display: inline-block;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_104TN\">\n</span></span><br />\n</span><br />\n<ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_104TC\" style=\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\"><span id=\"bc_0_105b+seedalXOD\" kind=\"d\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_104B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom-width: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/06/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_12.html?showComment=1465892866307#c5674239966227158854\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">June 14, 2016 at 1:57 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_104MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nhi a,<br />\n<br />\nIn the POISON INJECTED Katha Upanishad, Yama is portrayed as a teacher to Nachiketa, a little boy, and their conversation evolves to a discussion of the nature of humans, knowledge, Atman (soul, self) and moksha (liberation)<br />\n<br />\nSIMPLE THUMB RULE--<br />\n<br />\nFIND OUT WHO WERE THE AGENTS OF JEW ROTHSCHILD<br />\n<br />\nFIND OUT WHOM THEY PROPAGATED<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">VIVEKANANDA USED TO KEEP REPEATING NACHIKETA<br /><br />THE POISON INJECTED IS THAT YAMA GAVE MOKSHA TO NACHIKETA<br /><br />YAMA CANNOT GIVE MOKSHA .<br /><br />NEITHER THERE IS HELL IN HINDUISM .</span></b><br />\n<br />\nhttp://isha.sadhguru.org/blog/sadhguru/masters-words/intensity-spiritual-path-story-nachiketa/<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br />IN SANATANA DHARMA YAMA IS LOKPALA ( GUARDIAN ) OF SOUTH DIRECTION. THIS HAS NOTHING TO DO WITH HELL.&nbsp;</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\">YAMA DOES NOT HOLD THE \"FINAL JUDGEMENT\" LIKE IN CHRISTIANITY. THIS GOES AGAINST THE LAWS OF KARMA.</span></b><br />\n<br />\nTHE OPIUM DRUG RUNNING PARTNERS OF JEW ROTHSCHILD/ SASSOON ( CALCUTTA ) GAMBLED ON DHANTERAS , FIRST DAY OF DIWALI TO PLEASE YAMA. KUBERA IS THE OPPOSITE DIRECTION -GUARDIAN OF NORTH.<br />\n<br />\nHERE IS BULLSHIT IN WIKIPEDIA-<br />\n<br />\nQUOTE: An ancient legend ascribes the occasion to on interesting story about the 16-year-old son of King Hima. His horoscope predicted his death by snake-bite on the fourth day of his marriage. On that particular day, his newly-wed wife did not allow him to sleep. She laid out all her ornaments and lots of gold and silver coins in a heap at the entrance of the sleeping chamber and lit lamps all over the place. Then she narrated stories and sang songs to keep her husband from falling asleep. The next day, when Yama, the god of Death, arrived at the prince\u2019s doorstep in the guise of a Serpent, his eyes were dazzled and blinded by the brilliance of the lamps and the jewellery. Yama could not enter the Prince's chamber, so he climbed on top of the heap of gold coins and sat there the entire night listening to the stories and songs. In the morning, he silently went away. Thus, the young prince was saved from the clutches of death by the cleverness of his new bride, and the day came to be celebrated as Dhanteras. The following day came to be called Naraka Chaturdashi ('Naraka' means hell and Chaturdashi means 14th). It is also known as \u2018Yamadeepdaan\u2019 as the ladies of the house light earthen lamps or \u2018deep\u2019 and these are kept burning throughout the night glorifying Yama, the God of Death. Since this is the night before Diwali, it is also called 'Chhoti Diwali' or Minor Diwali.[2]<br />\n<br />\nAccording to another popular legend, when the Gods and demons churned the ocean for Amrita or nectar, Dhanvantari (the physician of the Gods and an incarnation of Vishnu) emerged carrying a jar of the elixir on the day of Dhanteras.[2] UNQUOTE<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\">YAMA HAS BEEN INJECTED ALL OVER VEDAS / UPANISHADS BY JEW ROTHSCHILD TO SUSTAIN THE FALSE THEORY OF HELL IN HINDUISM.</span></b><br />\n<br />\n######################################<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">TRUTH : &nbsp;CREMATION FIRE ( AGNI ) IS YAMAs PRIEST AS PER VEDAS . &nbsp;YAMA PROPELs THE SOUL WHEN THE SKULL POPS DURING CREMATION TO A SUITABLE ASTRAL LAYER . &nbsp;YAMA IS ALSO THE SON OF VIVASAT , THE KEEPER OF DHARMA</span></b><br />\n<br />\n###############################################################<br />\n<br />\nMY REVELATIONS NOW JUMP TO 20.45%<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_105b+seedalXOD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_105b+seedalXOD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; text-decoration: none;\">June 14, 2016 at 11:43 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_152MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nHello Ajit,<br />\nHow are you? I read your blog every now and then to know a bit more about our culture. I have also been thinking about our contrasting stances and notions on equality. Perhaps we should teach our kids that 'though no man is created equal to another, no man is born superior to any other'. This statement has a more profound connection to our values than the odd saying that all men are created equal. I believe everyone is endowed with a unique quality that if found and invested upon in terms of training, can lead to higher than average outputs to the society. I would like to have your opinion on this matter.</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_152BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; It does not mean he has to compare with others ( though it may be very difficult not to compare with others ;) ).<br />\n<br />\nAs CAPT said, SANATAN DHARM allows each individual/soul to come to terms with themselves with their own terms/timetables/conditions !<br />\n<br />\nRegards,<br />\nS</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_149MN\" kind=\"m\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-638470042\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_149BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/06/methane-time-bomb-arctic-ice-meltdown.html?showComment=1466316835179#c1872181721669223597\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">June 19, 2016 at 11:43 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_151MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nARYABHATTA NOW GETS \"VADAKAYIL PRIZE\".<br />\n<br />\nAryabhatta of 2700 BC, from my hometown of Calicut was the first to propound the HELIOCENTRIC model of the cosmos, the Siderial day length, and that the earth rotates on its own axis, all the while moving in space -- in writing. Aryabhatta had written that the moon reflects the light from the sun.<br />\n<br />\nFor his his astronomical calculations he used a latitude near Calicut. I am a navigator trained in this subject-- A MASTER NAVIGATOR. For the first 5 years of my command i used SEXTANT .<br />\n<br />\nAryabhatta was the first to calculate Pi of 3.1416 and the solar year of 365.358 days .<br />\n<br />\nHe propounded a heliocentric universe 4000 years before Copernicus, with elliptically orbiting planets and a spherical earth spinning on its axis explaining the motion of the heavens.<br />\n<br />\nHe was the father of plane / spherical Trigonometry and Algebra, when Europe was in the dark ages..<br />\n<br />\nAryabhatta was the first to compute the circumference of the earth, with an error of just 64 mile.<br />\n<br />\nTHE ROTHSCHILD HISTORIAN KICKED ARYABHATTA FORWARD IN TIME BY 3200 YEARS .<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Aryabhata</span><br />\n<br />\n##########################<br />\n<br />\nTHE LIST OF MAHA MERUS WHO FOOLED THE WORLD , WHOM I HAVE TRASHED INTO THE GARBAGE BIN OF THE PLANET NOW REACHES 17<br />\n<br />\nGARBAGE BUCKET LIST:<br />\n<br />\n1) BERTRAND RUSSEL<br />\n2) ROMILA THAPAR<br />\n3) IRFAN HABIB<br />\n4) NOAM CHOMSKY<br />\n5) RAMCHANDRA GUHA<br />\n6) SHELDON POLLOCK<br />\n7) SIGMUND FREUD<br />\n8) GEORG WILHELM HEGEL<br />\n9) AMARTYA SEN<br />\n10) WENDY DONIGER<br />\n11) FREIDRICH WILHELM NIETZSCHE<br />\n12) IMMANUEL KANT<br />\n13 ) BARUCH SPINOZA<br />\n14) ALBERT EINSTEIN<br />\n15) ISAAC NEWTON<br />\n16) GUGLEILMO MARCONI<br />\n17) CHARLES DARWIN<br />\n<br />\nNOTE: MENTAL MIDGETS LIKE ROMILA THAPAR , INFAN HABIB , RAMACHANDRA GUHA, SHELDON POLLOCK, WENDY DONIGER MUST BE THANKFUL THAT THEY ARE INCLUDED AMONG A LIST OF CEREBRAL GIANTS<br />\n<br />\n#########################<br />\n<br />\nHERE ARE PEOPLE WHO MADE A DENT IN THE UNIVERSE\u2014THEY GET THE \"VADAKAYIL PRIZE\". The antenna and the mirror image behave very like a half wave dipole. The car's antenna is quarter wave long and the car body provides the mirror image<br />\n<br />\nLike a dipole antenna, a monopole has an omnidirectional radiation pattern. That is it radiates equal power in all azimuthal directions perpendicular to the antenna, but the radiated power varies with elevation angle, with the radiation dropping off to zero at the zenith, on the antenna axis.<br />\n<br />\nEVERY STAMBHA IN ANCIENT TIMES HAS IRRIDIUM AND RHODIUM INHERENT IN THE VAHANA FIGURE OF THE DEITY RIGHT ON TOP. VAHANA MEANS CARRIER ( WAVE ).<br />\n<br />\nToday any incoming missile is shot down in seconds using circular arrays are composed of thousands of crossed dipole antennas.<br />\n<br />\nThe impedance of a 1/4 lambda Marconi antenna is 36.6 ohms.A \u00bd lambda dipole has an impedance of about 70 ohms .
