VIDEO\nCHANNELS TOO,&nbsp; IF THEY NEED BROADCASTING RIGHTS\nIN INDIA.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/jF3hXu2wH3g/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/jF3hXu2wH3g?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sound has a mystic\nside.&nbsp; The audible sound (vaikari)&nbsp; is heard by all, but the mystical vibrations\nof mantras , even though appearing to the ear as ordinary sounding\nsyllabifications, are not really \u2019heard.\u2019 The latter sound , technically known\nas para-vak,&nbsp; is considered the domain of\nthe advanced 12 strand DNA maharishis. <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/caf1HAXHhdA/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/caf1HAXHhdA?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mantras are Scalar\nenergy based sounds which resonate in the Zero Point Field Aakashik hyperspace.\nMantra is a carrier wave with potent information within it.&nbsp; Mantras must begin and end with OM which\nresonates with the earths heartbeat of 7.83 hertz.&nbsp;&nbsp; Our 7000 year old Vedas say, that all forms\nof reality are sound forms\u2014music\u2014their very substance composed of vibration.\nThis Shabda-brahman is the great cosmic wavelength experienced as God.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The maharishis realized\nBrahman, or \u201ctranscendental consciousness,\u201d in the form of sound. They knew\nthat this transcendental sound, which has no limits and is immeasurable,\nmanifests not only within the vital air known as prana, but also through our\nsenses and even our mind.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We all know that&nbsp;\nsound is the vehicle for emotion, which we can either reinforce or\nrelease. We sing with joy, shout in anger, cry in sorrow and groan in pain.\nThus each emotion corresponds to a particular kind of sound, and intensified\nemotions usually demand stronger sounds.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">During japa, the whole\nbody vibrates and all other sensations go numb. It\u2019s a beautiful, sensuous\nfeeling that purifies and elevates your entire being to a higher level.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Japa involves the\nmeditative repetition of a mantra. Mantra is mystical energy encapsulated\nwithin a sound structure. Every mantra contains in its vibrations a certain\npower.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/RFq8Nly0qyE/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/RFq8Nly0qyE?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vachika japa: the\nmantra is repeated out loud<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Upamsu japa: the mantra\nis repeated semi-audibly by moving only the tongue and lips<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Manasa japa: the mantra\nis repeated mentally without allowing the tongue and lips to move<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Likhita japa: the\nmantra is written continuously or for a fixed number of times<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Akhanda japa: the\nmantra is repeated for a specific number of times without a break, or for a\nfixed period of time, such as from sunrise to sunset. Akhanda japa is often\nperformed rhythmically and congregationally.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Alapa japa: the mantra\nis repeated mentally at all times and with every breath.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Patanjali speaks of 14\nkinds of japa:&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; daily (nitya),\ncircumstantial (naimittika), the japa of desired results (kamya), forbidden\n(nishiddha), penitential (prayashchitta), unmoving (achala), moving (chala),\nvoiced (vachika), whispered (upanshu), murmured (bhramara), mental (manasa),\nuninterrupted (akhanda), nonuttered (ajapa) and circumambulatory (pradakshina).<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<img src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-6u2ejnnJJm0/U2B_5Na0euI/AAAAAAAAr1A/3bqbZKom2fc/s1600/chanting-gfrjapa.jpg\" /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The RUDRAKSHA MALA with\n108 beads is placed over the middle finger and flicked by the thumb.&nbsp; The index finger is not used, as it\nrepresents the ego, which must be transcended to achieve self-realisation.&nbsp;&nbsp; The mala retains some of the energy of the\nmantra, and hence the same mala is used for a mantra. Hold the mala with your\nright hand, resting beads on your middle finger.&nbsp; The count begins from the first bead that is\nnext to the big dividing bead.&nbsp; The\ndividing bid should never get passed.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2012/05/rudraksha-tears-of-shiva-capt-ajit.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2012/05/rudraksha-tears-of-shiva-capt-ajit.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As\nyou chant, rotate beads between middle finger and a thumb.&nbsp; Go from one bead to the next as you repeat\nthe mantra, a bead per mantra.&nbsp; If you\ndid one circle of 108 bids, it means you said the mantra 108 times. Turn the\nmala around and begin from the bead you have just finished with. Do not use\ndividing bid for chanting<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Quantum Physics tells\nus today that every state of matter has its own associated vibration.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">4000 years ago, Adi\nShankaracharya commented on the Brahma Sutras.&nbsp;\n\u201cThe sound created by the explosion of the primordial atom gave rise to\nthe causal, subtle and gross forms of the universe.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Shabda-Brahman is a\nvibratory reality, which exists underlying the reality which we can perceive.\nAccording to Vedic theory, this pure vibrational current, flows eternally \u2013 a\nkind of river of sublime truths \u2013 that can be accessed by anyone who has the\nability to penetrate within it.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In case of each Tantric\nmantra, the practitioner needs to know its rishi (seer), devata (deific power),\nchanndas (rhythm), svara (accentuation), prayogya (application), beej (seed\npower), shakti (a fraction of itself that expresses its power), kavacha\n(armour), kilaka (recitation of which prevents the mantra\u2019s power from moving\naway from the practitioner) and nyasa (the process by which various sounds in\nthe mantra are identified with the energy in particular limbs).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nyasa involves touching\nvarious parts of the body while saying specific portions of a mantra. This\ninvokes the&nbsp; presence of the deity of the\nmantra inside the body. Each mantra is associated with a specific Nyasa. There\nare various types of Nyasas, the most important of them being Kara Nyasa and\nAnga Nyasa.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/jJWFenO_-G0/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/jJWFenO_-G0?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">No cosmic sound can be\nheard by man\u2019s naked ears.&nbsp; Scientists\nhave found that the sound emanating from planets is pitched twenty octaves\nbelow man\u2019s hearing, while the song of the atom is sung a complementary twenty\noctaves above it, leaving us \u201cmusically midway\u201d between the trebles and basses\nof the micro and macro-cosmic worlds.&nbsp;\nThe function of a mantra is to create vibrations in the inner\nconsciousness, that will prepare for realization.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Being indifferent towards\nall objects, he who has controlled his passions should continuously concentrate\nupon the sound which dissolves the mind.\u2026the sound proceeding from Pranava (OM)\nwhich is BrahmAn itself-&nbsp;&nbsp; Nadabindu\nUpanishad 5000 BC<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The spiritual efficacy\nof OM is based not on the gross sound, but on the subtle sound, which is heard,\nnot by the ears but by the heart, which is uttered not by the mouth but by the\nmind.&nbsp; OM is the quintessence, the\nseed-syllable (bija mantra) of the universe, the universal force of the all-embracing\nconsciousness.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201cThat indestructible\ntranscendent vibrating sound is Shabda-Brahman.\u201d-- Shiksha Upanishad 5000 BC<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Letters in Sanskrit are\ncalled akshara, the eternal; they are sound symbols of the eternal reality. The\nfunction of a mantra in Sanskrit is to create vibrations in the inner\nconsciousness. The Vedanta-sutras add that ultimate liberation comes from sound\n(anavrittih shabdat).&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There are 11 ways of\nreciting the Vedas-&nbsp; Samhita, Pada,\nKrama, Jata, Maalaa, Sikha, Rekha, Dhwaja, Danda, Rathaa and Ghana.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">nama-rupatmanosh\nshabda-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">bhavayor avalambanat<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">yo yogah sadhyate\nso'yam<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">mantra-yogah\nprakirttitah<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"The yoga which is\npracticed through the support of a proper mood (bhava) and sound (shabda), and\nthrough the support of the Self composed of name and form (nama-rupa) is called\nmantra-yoga.\"- Mantra-yoga-samhita (3.4)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mantra-yoga is one of\nthe most important paths within traditional yoga, and concerns the different\nexpressions of sound, from the most subtle to the coarsest. It is with good\nreason that the Vayaviya Samhita of the Shiva-purana, in describing the five\nclasses of yoga, places mantra yoga first.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Dve brahmani veditavye\nsabda bramha param ca yat<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sabda bramhani nisnatah\nparam bramhadhi gacchati<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201cThere are two Bramhans\nto be realized, Shabda and Param Bramhan: one who has realized and well versed\nin Shabda Bramhan will realize Param BramhAn.\u201d&nbsp;&nbsp;\n:-<b>Amrta Bindu Upanisad- 5000 BC</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mantra is part of a\nuniversal language rooted in sound, image, number and symbol, reflecting a\n\"cosmic thinking\" beyond the preconceptions and biases of human thought.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: center;\">\n<img height=\"295\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-b0IBn3QatJA/U2DP8BwUAKI/AAAAAAAAr5A/ZUEPpogpAE8/s400/scalar-wavyyes.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mantra functions\naccording to the inner mathematics of cosmic law.&nbsp; It serves to link our individual intelligence\nwith the greater intelligence that pervades all space, extending our awareness\ninto the Infinite and Eternal.&nbsp; To chant\na mantra at a deeper yogic level is to think with the entire universe and to\naccess the wisdom and experience of all beings.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mantra in the yogic\nsense relates to the prime energies, ideas, principles or archetypes of the\ncosmic intelligence that directs the forces of nature and the movements of our\nown minds and hearts.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There are mantric\nsounds that can awaken the higher potentials of the brain and change the flow\nof energy in the nervous system.&nbsp; Each\none of us has a unique sound pattern that sustains all that we do and allows\nour energies to move and grow or stagnate and decline.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Unless we learn to\nharmonize our inner sound vibrations, our lives will likely remain in\ndisharmony and suffering.&nbsp; Mantra is the\nmost important tool for attuning our bodies and minds to their proper\nresonance, which is not with the outer world, but with the divine presence that\nconstitutes our own deepest Self.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mantra maintains the\nstrength and integrity of our mental field, so that the mind no longer wanders\noff or loses its composure.&nbsp; Mantra\nsustains the proper circulation of energies in the sphere of the mind, so that\nwe are no longer vulnerable to external conditioning which, after all, is based\nlargely on reactive patterns of words and names.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Just as Yoga asanas\nplace the body in a calm and relaxed state, so mantras puts the mind into a\nsteady and relaxed state for meditation.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mantra practice\ngradually calms and integrates the mind.&nbsp;\nThe mind becomes silent, concentrated and reflective, allowing our\nawareness to vibrate with the mantra.&nbsp;\nThis naturally leads to deeper meditation, in which the mantra may fall\naway.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: center;\">\n<img src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-xWHxp53x_Wk/U2DOxWcDMJI/AAAAAAAAr4Y/YFeDz6ucyoQ/s1600/constructive_d99estructive_wave.gif\" /></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Formless meditation is\nhard to achieve directly but becomes easily accessible once one builds the\npower of mantra in the mind. When we repeat a mantra, or do various forms of\nchanting, a more refined vibration develops and begins to assume the background\npattern of our mind, down to a subconscious level.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: center;\">\n<img height=\"400\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-hBf7IiroSZo/U2DO2taSKdI/AAAAAAAAr4g/udRv7XJi_bg/s400/interfe8rence2.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If we continually\nreturn to the mantra each time our mind becomes agitated, then the mantra's\npower to calm the mind will increase.&nbsp;\nWith the mantra, we have a tool for redirecting the energy of the mind\nwithin so that we can reclaim our inner composure.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When Hatha Yoga was\nfirst propagated in North America,&nbsp; there\nwas a lot of prejudice against all things PAGAN Hinduism.&nbsp;&nbsp; So, naturally, the critical mantra got left\nout of Hatha practice.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mainstream\nAmerica and the environments\u2014the YMCAs, gyms, adult education classes\u2014in which\nYoga classes were held, were not conducive to holding the Indian culture.&nbsp; They wanted to eat the food , but left out\nthe amazing flavour .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Japa is not a mere mechanical\nactivity, but a very intense activity with profound concentration. It can be a\nbit hard to start with, but with practice it becomes easier and more natural.\nRepeat the mantra softly with concentration so as to lead the mind to pass\nbeyond everything that is connected with the domain of thought.&nbsp; Try to reach the spiritual domain where even\nthought is not allowed to enter.&nbsp; The\nmind must be perfectly calm, as though it no longer existed.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The tradition of\nrepeating the mantra existed in the Patanjali school of yoga, they call its\nswadhyaya, not japa.&nbsp; It begins as an\nordinary sound, later it becomes in you the power of the mantra, it transforms\nyou.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Japa can be practiced\nunder any conditions: when one is walking, standing or sitting, giving or receiving,\nlying down or doing any of the things we do in everyday life, whatever the\nsituation in which you find yourself.&nbsp;\nThere is no restriction, rule or limit.&nbsp;\nWhen one repeats japa with faith and respect, one certainly arrives at a\nhappy state<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The effect of the\nmantra is not produced at the level of reason. The knowledge acquired by the\nrepetition of the mantra extends far beyond the level of reason. In India we\nsay that it is in the depths of consciousness. A big chunk of the Vedas are\nmantras.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sanskrit is called the\nlanguage of nature because it maintains a correlation between sound and form\ncalled namarupa.&nbsp; This means that the\nsound of the word matches the thing it is describing. The alphabets could be\nseen by the seers in their minds when it was uttered.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sanskrit\u2019s resonant\nfrequencies match the energy centres (chakras) in the subtle body and the\nsounds stimulate, activate, energize and open them.&nbsp; This increases the flow of life force (prana)\nin your mind and body resulting in improved health, strength and heightened\nawareness.&nbsp; This shows that Sanskrit is a\ndivine language .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The cochlea in the\ninner ear and it has a spiral shape and has three and half coils .&nbsp; Kundalini like cochlea is coiled and rests at\nthe base of the backbone.&nbsp; Kundalini has\nthree and half coils too. If cochlea contains nerves that connects sound\nvibrations with the nervous system that generates consciousness--\nKundalini&nbsp; is the&nbsp; subtlest of vibrations that generate\nconsciousness in human self.&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nada Yoga talks about\ndifferent postures to hear the inner sound by closing the ears with thumbs. The\nhearing&nbsp; of inner sound has direct\ncorrelation with the rising of esoteric&nbsp;\nKundalini in human bodies that&nbsp;\nopens the floodgate of universal consciousness in individual bodies.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Brain scans of have\nbeen taken of participants were compared while in a resting state and during\nthe chanting of japa or kirtans.&nbsp; The\nstudy revealed that there was a marked increase in brain activity in areas of\nthe brain that control memory.&nbsp; One\nparticularly significant finding was that the increase in brain activity occurs\nin the first part of the brain to experience a functional decrease in\nAlzheimer\u2019s patients. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; body.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When you speak the bija\nmantras, you resonate with the energy of the associated chakra.--as mentioned\nin the&nbsp; Jabala Darsana Upanishad in 5000\nBC.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ham, Yam, Ram, Vam and\nLam are the panch bhoota mantras.&nbsp; The\nfive elements evolve from the five tanamatras (principals); earth from gandha\n(smell), water from rasa (taste), fire from rupa (sight), air from sparsha\n(touch) and akasha from shabda (hearing). <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When sounding the bija\nmantras for the chakras we are connecting with the different elements. The\nconnection with the element is created by the tongue position in the mouth and\nby visualising the shape of the element when sounding the mantra.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Words like namaaha,\nsvaaha, svadha, vashat, voushat, hum and phat are joined to the bija mantras. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">These words either\ndepict the mental state of a seeker at the time of chanting the mantra or\nwhatever he wishes to achieve... Their implied meanings are as follows.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A. Namaaha&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; : The serene state of the antahkaran&nbsp;&nbsp; appeasing the deity of the mantra by\nsurrendering to it.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">B. Svaaha&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; : Destruction of harmful energy,\nappeasing the deity of the mantra with offerings.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">C. Svadha&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; : Self-contentment, strengthening\noneself<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">D. Vashat&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; : A spiritual emotion of destroying the\nenemy<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">E. Voushat&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; : To create conflicts or opposition among\nenemies,&nbsp; to acquire power and wealth<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">F. Hum&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; : Anger and courage, to frighten\none\u2019s enemy<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">G. Phat&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; : A spiritual emotion of attacking\nthe enemy, to drive the enemy away.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201cLAM\u201d-&nbsp; Muladhara chakra 1 (root)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When properly produced,\nthe sound LANG excites the nadis (subtle channels of energy) in the first\nchakra and creates a lock that prevents the downward movement of energy. LA is\nthe sound for the earth element and NG is nada-bindu, the primal cosmic sound\nfrom which the universe manifested. Repetition of the bija manta LANG deepens\nconcentration, giving awareness and inner strength. Its vibrations create a\npassage inside the Brahma Nadi. Brahma Nadi, is the subtle channel through which\nthe Kundalini, when awakened moves from Muladhara to Sahasrara Chakra. The\nelement associated with the Muladhara Chakra is Earth. The square is the symbol\nfor Earth. It represents the four directions and the four dimensions.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201cVAM\u201d-&nbsp; Swadisthana chakra 2 (sacral/navel)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When the bija mantra\nVANG is repeated the Svadhishtana Chakra is purified. The power of Varuna, an\naspect of Vishnu (the sustainer of creation) is present in thebija mantra VANG.\nIn Hindu mythology, Varuna is considered the god of all forms of the water\nelement. When the bija mantra VANG is repeated it enhances the production and\ncirculation of fluids in the body. The shape associated with this element is\nthe circle, which represents the element water. Water droplets are spherical.\nWater is the essence of life. Almost three quarters of the human body is water,\nwhich is present in blood, mucous, urine, saliva, lymph and other fluids.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201cRAM\u201d- Manipura chakra\n3 (solar plexus)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The bija mantra for\nthis chakra is RAM sounded as RANG.&nbsp; Agni\nis the god of fire and the acceptor of sacrifices. The ram is the vehicle of\nAgni. The ram is the carrier of the bija mantra RAM. The sound RANG increases\nthe digestive fire, which enhances assimilation and absorption. It contributes\nto longevity, the main goal of a person motivated by this chakra. The nature of\nfire is to move upwards and the repetition of this mantra, when produced\nproperly helps the upward movement of the Kundalini. The fire element in the\nnavel region aids in the digestion and absorption of food,which supplies the\nwhole body with vital energy. The fire element is related tohunger, thirst,\nsleep, lethargy and radiance (ojas). The triangle is the symbol of the fire\nelement. Visualisation of a triangle of bright redcolour in the Manipura Chakra\nhelps the aspirant in his/her spiritual evolution<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201cYAM\u201d- Anahata chakra 4\n(heart)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The bija mantra for\nthis chakra is YAM sounded as YANG. The mantra is focused in the heart chakra.\nWhen this sound is produced properly the spiritual heart vibrates and any\nblocks in the cardiac region are cleared. True knowledge dawns in the\nconsciousness and the second knot, the Vishnu Granthi, is undone, allowing\nenergy to start to flow upward. Sounding the bija mantra YANG gives one control\nover air, prana and the breath. The bija mantra YANG is the sound form of the\ndeity Vayu, the lord of the air/wind. The Anahata Chakra is associated with the\nsix-pointed star which is made up of two triangles. The one pointing upwards\nsymbolises Shiva, the male principal. The other triangle points downward\nsymbolising Shakti, the female principal--stolen by the Jews.&nbsp; The six-pointed star also symbolises the\nbalancing of energy in the Heart chakra, which lies between the three chakras\nabove it and the three chakras below it. The Anahata Chakra is associated with\nlove and the desire for sharing and sympathy. Here energy can move upward or\ndownward. The element associated with the Anahata Chakra is vayu (air or wind).\nVayu is thevital life-giving force (prana). It aids the functions of the lungs\nand heart, circulating fresh oxygen and vital energy.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201cHAM\u201d- Vishudha chakra\n5 (throat)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The bija mantra for\nthis chakra is HAM sounded as HANG. The \u2018H\u2019 sound in the bija mantra HANG is\nproduced at the back of the throat. The mantra is focused in the throat chakra.\nWhen this sound is produced properly. It vibrates the brain and causes the\ncerebrospinal fluid to flow more freely in the throat region.&nbsp; The Vishuddha Chakra is associated with the\nelement akasha (ether) and the sense of hearing, as well as the action of\nspeaking. The symbol for this chakra is the crescent. The sliver crescent is\nthe symbol of nada, pure cosmic sound. The moon implies psychic energy,\nclairvoyance andcommunication without words. The influence of the five elements\nceases after the fifth chakra and the aspirant becomes a tattvatit, one who has\ngone beyond the grip of the elements.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201cOM\u201d- Ajna chakra 6\n(third eye/brow)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The bija mantra AUM .\nThe pravana, AUM, is the source of all sounds and is connected with anahata\nnada, the primal cosmic sound. It thus creates unity and is a combination of\nsun (A), moon (U), and fire (M). The third eye plays an important role in the\npiercing of the third knot, Rudra Granthi. When Rudra Granthi is pierced,\nindividuality is dropped, the old ego awareness is left behind and the\nexperience of unmanifest consciousness emerges at the Sahasrara Chakra. The\nsymbol for this chakra is the circle with two petals on either side. A person\nwho has reached this level of awareness has a body that constantly radiates the\nsound AUM. The aura of such persons enables all those who come into their\npresence to become calm and sensitive to the refined sound frequencies of AUM.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201cALL AH\u201d-&nbsp; Sahasrara chakra 7 (crown)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br />\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\">ALLAH</span> OF ISLAM IS LIFTED FROM BEEJ MANTRA OF SAHASRARA CHAKRA</b><br />\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b>\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\">786</span> OF ISLAM &nbsp;( ON THE COVER PAGE OF KORAN ) &nbsp;IS LIFTED FROM OM-- SHOW OM SYMBOL INTO A MIRROR AND READ FROM RIGHT TO LEFT&nbsp;</b><br />\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: center;\">\n<img alt=\"Image result for MENDELEEV PERIODIC TABLE SOUND BASED MUSIC SRI YANTRA\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://encrypted-tbn1.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcQPR4rCmvvZXmOUPAeQ-9cHpQ2nNmASwv-kFstk-0F32_7dOxeO\" width=\"298\" /></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2009/07/vedic-practises-in-mecca-ajit-vadakayil.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2009/07/vedic-practises-in-mecca-ajit-vadakayil.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Sanskrit the word\n\u2018Sahasrara\u2019, means thousand, so the Sahasrara Chakra is the \u2018Lotus of the\nThousand Petals\u2019 and is located four finger-breadths above the crown of the\nhead. When the Kundalini is raised up to the Sahasrara Chakra, the illusion of\nthe \u2018individual self\u2019 is dissolved. According to the scriptures, the Sahasrara\nChakra is the seat of the self-luminous Self, the essence of being. The sounds\nassociated with this chakra are ALL and AH .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<img src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-hydT7GgM02c/U18chH5EdeI/AAAAAAAArwo/LEaERUbQmJU/s1600/Page+10+Cu65ehakra.jpg\" /><br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<img src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-Q1dvaAqwvu8/Uys-kKXfVJI/AAAAAAAAqiY/31j8l5tkKUI/s1600/311695_4hgvk45278622178843_549638521_n.jpg\" /><br />\n<br />\n<div style=\"text-align: center;\">\n<img height=\"400\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-GscNBaWuguc/Uy1Z4qA1cmI/AAAAAAAAqqE/OHVy3MijV2k/s400/einstyqeincounting.jpg\" width=\"396\" /></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: center;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: center;\">\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_178M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; margin: 0px 0px 8px; text-align: left;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2015/10/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_11.html?showComment=1465519665462#c4889089742143835044\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">June 10, 2016 at 6:17 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_178MC\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<br />\nRavi<br />\nJune 10, 2016 at 2:24 AM<br />\nRespected Sir,<br />\nMy wife says that according to Hindu religion girls are not allowed to break a coconut. Is this true? If so what is the reason.<br />\nRegards<br />\nRavi<br />\n<br />\nReplyDelete<br />\nReplies<br />\n####################<br />\n<br />\nCapt. Ajit Vadakayil<br />\nJune 10, 2016 at 6:09 AM<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/04/vedic-quantum-intention-experiment.html<br />\n<br />\nTHE COCONUT MUST BREAK AT FIRST ATTEMPT - IT IS COMPULSORY<br />\n<br />\nTHIS IS WHY IN TEMPLES A MAN BREAKS IT FOR A WOMAN.<br />\n<br />\nIF THE WOMAN CAN MANAGE TO BREAK A COCONUT OF THE FIRST ATTEMPT, SHE CAN DO IT . SHE MUST NOT HAVE MENSES WHILE SHE BREAKS IT.<br />\n<br />\nCOCONUT BREAKING IS A BLOODLESS SACRIFICE--AND AN OFFERING OF UTMOST PURITY.<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>BELOW IS ANTI-HINDU NEWSPAPER \"THE HINDU\" RIDICULING COCONUT BREAKING AS A HEATHEN SUPERSTITION</b></span></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://www.thehindu.com/todays-paper/tp-national/tp-andhrapradesh/women-go-on-a-coconutbreaking-spree/article1784927.ece</span></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><b><span style=\"color: #3b3a39; font-family: &quot;georgia&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , serif; line-height: 18px;\">QUOTE: &nbsp;Meanwhile, A. Govardhan of the Jana Vignana Vedika, which created scientific temper among people, told&nbsp;</span><i style=\"color: #3b3a39; font-family: Georgia, &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; line-height: 18px; outline: 0px;\">The Hindu</i><span style=\"color: #3b3a39; font-family: &quot;georgia&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , serif; line-height: 18px;\">&nbsp;that some businessmen spread the canard. UNQUOTE</span></b></span></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; color: #3b3a39; font-family: &quot;georgia&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; font-size: large;\"><b>MR A GOVARDHAN SHOULD KEEP AWAY FROM HINDUISM.<o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%; text-align: left;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%; text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 250%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>WE HINDUS DO NOT WANT HIS BULLSHIT ADVISE OR\nTHE \"SCIENTIFIC TEMPER ADVISE\" &nbsp;OF BENAMI MEDIA<o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; color: #3b3a39; font-family: &quot;georgia&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , serif; font-size: 14px; line-height: 18px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; color: #3b3a39; font-family: &quot;georgia&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , serif; font-size: 14px; line-height: 18px;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 250%;\"><b><span style=\"font-size: large;\">NEVER MIND WHAT ALL THESE PEOPLE WITH ULTERIOR MOTIVES LIKE BR\nAMBEDKAR, &nbsp; EVR PERIYAR, &nbsp;MAHATMA PHULE SAAB, &nbsp;PANSARE, &nbsp;DHABOLKAR,&nbsp; KALBURGI,&nbsp;\nKANCHA ILAIYA SQUEAK , JNU COMMIES , &nbsp;INDOPHILES , LITERARY FEST DROHIS, &nbsp;BENAMI MEDIA &nbsp; ETC HAVE BEEN TELLING ABOUT SANATANA DHARMA<o:p></o:p></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 250%;\"><b><span style=\"font-size: large;\">THERE ARE ZILCH SUPERSTITIONS IN SANATANA\nDHARMA<o:p></o:p></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 250%;\"><b><span style=\"font-size: large;\">THIS BLOGSITE IS THE FIRST ON THE PLANET ,\nEVER, TO VIEW SANATANA DHARMA FROM A SCIENTIFIC PERSPECTIVE.&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/12/comments-overflow-for-inoperative-load_14.html?showComment=1513299301098#c2062343270619180569\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888;\">December 15, 2017 at 6:25 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_22MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">SOMEONE ASKED ME TO EXPOUND ON QUANTUM ENTANGLEMENT IN VEDAS</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">WHY DOES WIKIPEDIA BAN CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL. BECAUSE I GO WITH VEDAS AGAINST STUPID PEOPLE LIKE ISAAC NEWTON AND ALBERT EINSTEIN ( WHO SAYS FASTER THAN SPEED OF LIGHT IS IMPOSSIBLE ) \u2013 BOTH THIEVES WHO STOLE FROM VEDAS WITHOUT UNDERSTANDING .</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">ANCIENT VEDIC ASTROLOGY FACTORED IN QUANTUM ENTANGLEMENT.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">One of the core objections to astrology is that there is no known scientific mechanism to account for how it all works. Well for this modern scientists have to work hard for another 500 years . The lack of a mechanism using 5 low bandwidth human senses is MAD justification for dismissing a Quantum entanglement phenomenon.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">Quantum entanglement says that two entangled particles affect each other irrespective of distance and time. We humans are NOT what you see in the mirror, we are balls of energy called SOULS.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">IN KERALA ASTROLOGY WE RUSTLE COWRIE SHELLS. MY WIFE MATCHED MORE THAN 500 HOROSCOPES FOR MY ELDER SONs BRIDE . AT EVERY INSTANCE THE ASTROLOGER RUSTLED COWRIE SHELLS TO PICK UP A RANDOM NUMBER OF SHELLS.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">The lodestone (compass) was used successfully for several millennia in India. Kerala navigators traded with crete . Yet, no white man understood the Earth's magnetic field until the 20th century.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">In Mahabharata Arjuna shot his arrow into the red ruby eye of a magnetic fish floating unsteadily overhead in a transparent rotating bowl filled with water, by looking at its reflection in a placid pool of water below. He won the hand of Princess Draupadi at the Swayamvar. This is the ultimate test of human consciousness .</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">Only a couple of mammals like elephant, dolphin and bonobos can pass the mirror and colour test.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">Quantum entanglement breaks the bedrock rules of standard physics: that nothing can travel FASTER THAN LIGHT , that objects are only influenced by their immediate surroundings\u2014that we need to verify by using our limited bandwith five sense for scientific approval.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">Through quantum entanglement, seemingly independent particles become intertwined. Entangled atoms can no longer be considered separate entities, but make sense only as part of a whole \u2014 even though the atoms may be far apart.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">Quantum entangled particles can be used for \u201cquantum communication\u201d \u2014 a means of sending super secure messages that doesn't rely on cables, wireless signals, or code.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">Through a trick of quantum mechanics, you can link two particles in a special way, separate them, and then observe the effects of one upon the other over large distances. This is known as quantum entanglement \u2014 placing two objects in the same entangled quantum state.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">Entanglement can be demonstrated in the lab with particles of light. When these two particles, or photons, are separated over large distances, they are still correlated with each other. If you measure one particle, the other particle's state will be determined immediately no matter how far it is away.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">Because any interference with an entangled particle, even the mere act of observing it, automatically affects its partner, these missives can't be hacked. To hear quantum physicists tell it, entangled particles could help build a \u201cquantum internet,\u201d give rise to new kinds of coding, and allow for faster-than-light communication \u2014 possibilities that have powerful appeal in an era where hospitals, credit card companies, government agencies, even election systems are falling victim to cyber attacks.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">Quantum entanglement is a quantum mechanical phenomenon in which the quantum states of two or more objects have to be described with reference to each other, even though the individual objects may be spatially separated. This leads to correlations between observable physical properties of the systems.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">CONTINUED TO 2-</span></div>\n</div>\n<span style=\"color: red;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_22BR\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em; text-align: left;\">\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span id=\"bc_0_22b+seedBpewD\" kind=\"d\"></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"bc_0_18T\" kind=\"t\" style=\"margin: 8px 0px; cursor: pointer; display: inline-block;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_18TN\"></span></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"thread-dropContainer thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_18TD\" style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_22b+seedBpewD\" kind=\"d\" style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span class=\"thread-drop\"></span></span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_22b+seedBpewD\" kind=\"d\" style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_18TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block; font-size: 16px;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_18TN\"></span></span></span><br />\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n</div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_22b+seedBpewD\" kind=\"d\" style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"></span><br />\n<ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_18TC\" style=\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\"><span id=\"bc_0_22b+seedBpewD\" kind=\"d\" style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_18B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c5166903869757240958\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_18MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">CONTINUED FROM 1-</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">For example, it is possible to prepare two particles in a single quantum state such that when one is observed to be spin-up, the other one will always be observed to be spin-down and vice versa, this despite the fact that it is impossible to predict, according to quantum mechanics, which set of measurements will be observed.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">As a result, measurements performed on one system seem to be instantaneously influencing other systems entangled with it. Quantum entanglement has applications in the emerging technologies of quantum computing and quantum cryptography, and has been used to realize quantum teleportation experimentally.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">Imagine you are a photon, a packet of light. You are a tiny blip of energy, hurtling through the universe on your own. But you have a twin, another photon to whom you have been intimately connected since the day you were born. No matter what distance separates you, be it the width of a lab bench or the breadth of the universe, you mirror each other. Whatever happens to your twin instantaneously affects you, and vice versa.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">Entangled photons don't need wires or cables to link them, but on Earth it is necessary to use a fiber optic cable to transmit one of the particles to its desired location. But fibers absorb light as the photon travels through, so the quantum connection weakens with every mile the particle is transmitted. The previous distance record for what's known as quantum teleportation, or sending information via entangled particles, was about 141 kilometers</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">But no light gets absorbed in space, because there's nothing to do the absorbing. Space is empty. This means that entangled particles can be transmitted long distances across the vacuum and not lose information. Entangled particles sent through space could vastly extend the distance across which entangled particles communicate. The behavior of entangled particles in space and across vast distances offers insight into the nature of space-time.. Entangled photons know what their partner is doing</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">Modern physicists know that there are actually four fundamental forces: the two nuclear forces, the electromagnetic force and the gravitational force. All of these play a role in binding matter together, from the tiniest of atoms to the largest of planets.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">It is well known in physics experiments that the observer can become entangled with the object that they are measuring, changing the measurement.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">It is written in the Vedas that we are all entangled in some way, and there really is a connection between every living thing in the galaxy. The effects of quantum entanglement tend to be very small for everyday objects.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">Ancient Maharishis with 12 strand DNA and king sized pineal glands used their bodies for generating laser beams.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">Processes in large biomolecules could be influenced by quantum entanglement effects. In the world of condensed matter physics \u2014 the study of solids \u2014 entanglement is more commonplace.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">A superconductor floating over a magnet in the Meissner effect \u2014 are from macroscopic quantum entanglements of electrons, or a spooky \"force\" acting over large distances. Quantum entanglement plays a role in modern physics and it is a binding principle for matter and energy. However, quantum entanglement on a large scale is difficult to achieve, and even more difficult to observe in living creatures.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">Scientists are still struggling to develop a theory of Quantum Gravity and as a result a Grand Unified Field Theory\u2014which is represented by the divine 3D geometry of Sri Yantra\u2014the symbol of OM , whose digital number is 108.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">In Vedic Puranas the Great bear constellation stars ( 7 Sapt Rishis ) and entangled with their 7 wives in Pleiades constellation</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">CONTINUED TO 3-</span></div>\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_19B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 16px; They could transcend the senses and limitations of space-time.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">In the quantum picture, electromagnetic radiation has a dual nature, existing both as waves and as streams of particles called photons. Photons are exchanged whenever electrically charged subatomic particles interact.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">The photon has no electric charge, so it does not experience the electromagnetic force itself\u2014in other words, photons cannot interact with one another.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">At the level of quantum reality the universe is not made up of things. It is comprised of oscillating fields of energy. In the quantum domain everything is interrelated. The universe is filled with an incomprehensible amount of energy and substance\u2014some of which is imperceptible to our physical senses.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">Radio waves, microwaves, infrared waves and microscopic particles are just a few examples of the infinite aspects of reality that elude the perception of our 5 senses.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">Narrowing our 5 senses bands , serve as a filter or squelch to prevent breakdown due to excess information. The 5 senses create the set for the stage we call our lives.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">ALL INITIAL QUANTUM PHYCISISTS LEARNT SANSKRIT, AND THE VEDAS . THEY PONDERED ABOUT MAYA BEHIND THE QUANTUM SCREEN. . THEY ARE NOT STUPID TO DO THIS.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">The theory of Maya is one of the grand pillars upon which Vedanta rests. The word origin of MAYA is derived from the Sanskrit roots MA ( not ) and YA ( that ). The term MAYA is mentioned 72 times in Rigveda written down in Sanskrit in 5000 BC. Maya is mentioned 29 times in the Atharva Veda.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">In Puranas and Vaishnava theology, Maya is described as one of the nine shaktis of the reclining Vishnu. MAYA is the veritable fabric of duality, and she performs this role at the behest of BrahmAn, the morphogenetic consciousness field.. The Supreme God is not bound by Maya just as magicians do not believe the illusions of their own magic.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">Our 5 senses serve as a filter allowing us to experience only what is absolutely necessary for our physical existence. The 5 senses create the set for the stage we call our lives. The senses squelch out , let we will have a breakdown due to excess information. The quantum world cannot be observed by our 5 senses, and they do NOT follow the cause and effect laws of classical physics.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">CONTINUED TO 5--</span></div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_20MN\" kind=\"m\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_20BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_20B_box\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_21B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c3316054655910645909\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_21MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">CONTINUED FROM 4-</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">Maya is invisible and beyond sense-perception. No human can see beyond the quantum screen . What we have called matter is energy, whose vibration has been so lowered as to be perceptible to the senses. There is no matter. What is the difference between a quantum physicist and an ancient Indian maharishi seer of 9500 BC ?</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">The mystics took existence for granted, and knew how to get from here to there. They got to see beyond the apparition of MAYA. The distinction between the self and the Universe is a false dichotomy.</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">It is written in the Vedas that energy and matter are inter convertible.</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">The cosmos expands and contracts at regular cycles as explained by Sri Krishna in the Bhagawat Gita--just like inhalation and exhalation. ( breath of Brahma ).. The Puranas speak of the creation and destruction of the universe in cycles of 8.64 billion years, that is quite close to currently accepted value regarding the time of the big bang.</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">Even today the speed of light calculated by most modern means is same as what was calculated in Surya Siddhantam 6000 years ago.</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">The seer placed himself inside and saw outwards, for he has the perception afforded by a king sized pineal gland and 12 strand DNA to do so.</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">The CLASSICAL scientist with a shriveled pineal gland and 2 strand DNA ( 97% junk ) with pre-conceived notions pounded in by a moron Isaac Newton stood outside and peeked inside all the while scratching his head.</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">The Bible says that the big bang happened in 4004 BC, while Vedanta and the modern quantum theory agrees that it is around 15 billion years.</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">None of the quantum scientists have categorized Vedanta as a religious work. They have perused and found that it is a subtle mathematical or scientific analysis. Vedanta and modern Quantum Mechanics describe the same subject\u2014ultimate reality\u2014from opposite points of view and perspective. Vedanta says that we live in a time obstructed world using 5 narrow band senses -- and also a timeless realm in the quantum dimension, where what you see is NOT what you get.</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">It was written down in the Vedas said 7000 years ago that mind is over matter.
