text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-HD-RjQ6x2YA/V1P2uLP0pqI/AAAAAAABJr0/D-oVqp7mzdwHPN99Ts2WnWTCHuEpz4lugCLcB/s1600/Austraww2lian-Dairy-Industry-Production-Lifecycle.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"596\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-HD-RjQ6x2YA/V1P2uLP0pqI/AAAAAAABJr0/D-oVqp7mzdwHPN99Ts2WnWTCHuEpz4lugCLcB/s640/Austraww2lian-Dairy-Industry-Production-Lifecycle.png\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/07/nutritious-a1-milk-of-vedic-cows-with.html<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/12/shocking-legacy-of-mad-cow-disease-capt.html</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-3qZhw53GNLM/V1P3qwQLppI/AAAAAAABJsE/Qeq2aMYMwkU1ujlhwT1KSyuXYn1QRSh5wCLcB/s1600/causes-risk-factssors-corticosteroid.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"344\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-3qZhw53GNLM/V1P3qwQLppI/AAAAAAABJsE/Qeq2aMYMwkU1ujlhwT1KSyuXYn1QRSh5wCLcB/s640/causes-risk-factssors-corticosteroid.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Osteonecrosis is a\ndisease resulting from the temporary or permanent loss of blood supply to the\nbones. Without blood, the bone tissue dies, and ultimately the bone may\ncollapse.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If the process involves the bones near a joint, it often leads to\ncollapse of the joint surface.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Osteonecrosis is also known as avascular\nnecrosis, aseptic necrosis, and ischemic necrosis.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: left;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-SwSS71k-i78/V1P38hPTGaI/AAAAAAABJsM/px5_UVqzmAUX0bpgtoz1V-dA71oMq9W6gCLcB/s1600/Osteoprosis-ee11.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"520\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-SwSS71k-i78/V1P38hPTGaI/AAAAAAABJsM/px5_UVqzmAUX0bpgtoz1V-dA71oMq9W6gCLcB/s640/Osteoprosis-ee11.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">First I must break a\nbombshell.&nbsp;&nbsp; Corticosteroids were first proposed\nas growth promoting agents to improve commercial quality of meat.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Having BEEF and drinking\nA1 milk of HUMLPESS cows have caused untold health problems to ageing humans<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-1pNrJ6YvL28/V1P4jc4WP2I/AAAAAAABJsY/sEqLU0UYIhAaABhAgTVenuEOBw84_NtowCLcB/s1600/ZI-0BPL-2001-AUdsG00-HAYSTACK-14-1.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-1pNrJ6YvL28/V1P4jc4WP2I/AAAAAAABJsY/sEqLU0UYIhAaABhAgTVenuEOBw84_NtowCLcB/s400/ZI-0BPL-2001-AUdsG00-HAYSTACK-14-1.jpg\" width=\"383\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Avascular necrosis is\nthe death of bone tissue due to a lack of blood supply.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Also called osteonecrosis, avascular necrosis\ncan lead to tiny breaks in the bone and the bone's eventual collapse. The blood\nflow to a section of bone can be interrupted if the bone is fractured or the\njoint becomes dislocated.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Anyone can be affected\nby avascular necrosis. However, it's most common in people between the ages of\n30 and 60. Many people have no symptoms in the early stages of avascular\nnecrosis.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As the condition worsens, your affected joint may hurt only when you\nput weight on it. Eventually, the joint may hurt even when you're lying down.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Pain can be mild or\nsevere and usually develops gradually. Pain associated with avascular necrosis\nof the hip may be focused in the groin, thigh or buttock. In addition to the\nhip, the areas likely to be affected are the shoulder, knee, hand and foot.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Avascular necrosis\noccurs when blood flow to a bone is interrupted or reduced. Reduced blood\nsupply can be caused by:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Joint or bone trauma.\nAn injury, such as a dislocated joint, might damage nearby blood vessels.\nCancer treatments involving radiation also can weaken bone and harm blood\nvessels.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Fatty deposits in blood\nvessels. The fat (lipids) can block small blood vessels, reducing the blood\nflow that feeds bones.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Certain diseases.\nMedical conditions, such as sickle cell anemia and Gaucher's disease, also can\ncause diminished blood flow to bone.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Trauma. Injuries, such\nas hip dislocation or fracture, can damage nearby blood vessels and reduce\nblood flow to bones.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">High-dose use of\ncorticosteroids, such as prednisone, is the most common cause of avascular\nnecrosis that isn't related to trauma.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-wjr0SD8IG-g/V1P66WrK6dI/AAAAAAABJso/pmruZ_113WcUoI2IJ-tXFqEfh3kNUfe8gCLcB/s1600/corticosteroids-the-often-usedee-but-least-understood-drug-10-638.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"300\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-wjr0SD8IG-g/V1P66WrK6dI/AAAAAAABJso/pmruZ_113WcUoI2IJ-tXFqEfh3kNUfe8gCLcB/s400/corticosteroids-the-often-usedee-but-least-understood-drug-10-638.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-tjLzIdZ08uI/V1P7kCqa04I/AAAAAAABJs8/Bo2amiJAVQ0W3auunHLPxO84ur7nz1WwQCLcB/s1600/side-effects-corticosteroid-thereeapy.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"480\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-tjLzIdZ08uI/V1P7kCqa04I/AAAAAAABJs8/Bo2amiJAVQ0W3auunHLPxO84ur7nz1WwQCLcB/s640/side-effects-corticosteroid-thereeapy.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Corticosteroids can increase lipid\nlevels in your blood, reducing blood flow and leading to avascular necrosis.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-pRzdjd-5w1A/V1P7KYQDJOI/AAAAAAABJsw/attIIL2s3x0ClU2gieAByDrU8mqSUxyfwCLcB/s1600/Corticosffteroid_table.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"427\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-pRzdjd-5w1A/V1P7KYQDJOI/AAAAAAABJsw/attIIL2s3x0ClU2gieAByDrU8mqSUxyfwCLcB/s640/Corticosffteroid_table.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Consuming several\nalcoholic drinks a day for several years also can cause fatty deposits to form\nin your blood vessels.</span><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Because bone is living\ntissue that requires blood, an interruption to the blood supply causes bone to\ndie. If not stopped, this process eventually causes the bone to collapse.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/wZM49gnpW44/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/wZM49gnpW44?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Avascular necrosis most\ncommonly occurs in the upper leg. Other common sites are the upper arm, knees,\nshoulder, and ankles.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Medical conditions\nassociated with avascular necrosis include:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Pancreatitis<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Diabetes<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Gaucher's disease<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">HIV/AIDS<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Systemic lupus\nerythematosus<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sickle cell anemia<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Untreated, avascular\nnecrosis worsens with time.&nbsp; Eventually\nthe bone may become so weakened that it collapses.&nbsp; Avascular necrosis also causes bone to lose\nits smooth shape, potentially leading to severe arthritis.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Imaging tests can help\npinpoint the source of pain. The options include:--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">X-rays. They can reveal\nbone changes that occur in the later stages of avascular necrosis. In the\ncondition's early stages, X-rays usually appear normal. &nbsp;For osteonecrosis, x rays are not sensitive\nenough to detect bone changes in the early stages of the disease.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">MRI, is the most\nsensitive method for diagnosing osteonecrosis in the early stages.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/pGcZvSG805Y/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/pGcZvSG805Y?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Unlike x\nrays, bone scans, and CT (computed/computerized tomography) scans&nbsp; MRI detects chemical changes in the bone\nmarrow and can show avascular necrosis in its earliest stages.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/wv0-S3IWTm0/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/wv0-S3IWTm0?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">MRI provides the doctor\nwith a picture of the affected area and the bone-rebuilding process. In\naddition, MRI may show diseased areas that are not yet causing any symptoms.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/bOA2aCEfbrk/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/bOA2aCEfbrk?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A CT scan is an imaging\ntechnique that provides the doctor with a three-dimensional picture of the\nbone. It also shows \u201cslices\u201d of the bone, making the picture much clearer than\nx rays and bone scans. CT scans are less sensitive than MRIs.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/tS4a6I4-Yjo/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/tS4a6I4-Yjo?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Bone scan. A small\namount of radioactive material is injected into your vein. This tracer travels\nto the parts of your bones that are injured or healing and shows up as bright\nspots on the imaging plate. The goal is to prevent further bone loss. Specific\ntreatment usually depends on the amount of bone damage you already have.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Electrical currents\nmight encourage your body to grow new bone to replace the area damaged by\navascular necrosis. Electrical stimulation can be used during surgery and\napplied directly to the damaged area. Or it can be administered through\nelectrodes attached to your skin.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Normally, bone\ncontinuously breaks down and rebuilds - old bone is reabsorbed and replaced\nwith new bone. The process keeps the skeleton strong and helps it to maintain a\nbalance of minerals. In the course of avascular necrosis, however, the healing\nprocess is usually ineffective and the bone tissues break down faster than the\nbody can repair them.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The hip is a\nball-and-socket joint. The socket is formed by the acetabulum, which is part of\nthe large pelvis bone. The ball is the femoral head, which is the upper end of\nthe femur (thighbone). A slippery tissue called articular cartilage covers the\nsurface of the ball and the socket. It creates a smooth, low friction surface\nthat helps the bones glide easily across each other.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Normally, bone\ncontinuously breaks down and rebuilds\u2014old bone is replaced with new bone. This\nprocess, which takes place after an injury as well as during normal growth,\nkeeps the skeleton strong and helps it to maintain a balance of minerals.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In\nthe course of osteonecrosis, however, the healing process is usually\nineffective and the bone tissues break down faster than the body can repair\nthem. If left untreated, the disease progresses, the bone collapses, and the\njoint surface breaks down, leading to pain and arthritis.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Keep cholesterol levels\nlow. Tiny bits of fat are the most common substance blocking blood supply to\nbones. &nbsp;&nbsp;If AVN is caused by blood clots,\nyour doctor will prescribe medications to dissolve clots. If inflammation of\nthe arteries is responsible, your doctor may prescribe anti-inflammatory medicines.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Osteonecrosis develops\nin stages.&nbsp; Hip pain is typically the\nfirst symptom. This may lead to a dull ache or throbbing pain in the groin or\nbuttock area. As the disease progresses, it will become more difficult to stand\nand put weight on the affected hip, and moving the hip joint will be painful. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">An activity that is good for joints with AVN is swimming . &nbsp;Always rest joints when\nthey hurt.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-0_xjUH6_UDM/V1VhUEHIrKI/AAAAAAABJto/ajyg6ikK5Noyid4IZEPFmmMWSIEbZE5nwCLcB/s1600/ficateee-in-pictures.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"170\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-0_xjUH6_UDM/V1VhUEHIrKI/AAAAAAABJto/ajyg6ikK5Noyid4IZEPFmmMWSIEbZE5nwCLcB/s640/ficateee-in-pictures.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Because most people\ndon't start having symptoms until avascular necrosis is fairly advanced, your\ndoctor may recommend surgery.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The options include:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: cyan;\">Core decompression. </span>&nbsp;This surgical procedure removes the inner\ncylinder of bone, which reduces pressure within the bone, increases blood flow\nto the bone, and allows more blood vessels to form. &nbsp;In addition to reducing your pain, the extra\nspace within your bone stimulates the production of healthy bone tissue and new\nblood vessels.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Core decompression works best in people who are in the earliest\nstages of osteonecrosis, often before the collapse of the joint. &nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">This procedure involves\ndrilling one larger hole or several smaller holes into the femoral head to\nrelieve pressure in the bone and create channels for new blood vessels to\nnourish the affected areas of the hip. When osteonecrosis of the hip is\ndiagnosed early, core decompression is often successful in preventing collapse\nof the femoral head and the development of arthritis. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-1_Myu9GfeJ0/V1Vg2E3V_wI/AAAAAAABJtg/-LZ2jL0hSmsE7LWYOZKnhCwaUECU1Nz1QCLcB/s1600/codddre.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-1_Myu9GfeJ0/V1Vg2E3V_wI/AAAAAAABJtg/-LZ2jL0hSmsE7LWYOZKnhCwaUECU1Nz1QCLcB/s400/codddre.jpg\" width=\"337\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Core decompression is\noften combined with bone grafting to help regenerate healthy bone and support\ncartilage at the hip joint. A bone graft is healthy bone tissue that is\ntransplanted to an area of the body where it is needed.&nbsp; Bone graft procedure can help strengthen the\narea of bone affected by avascular necrosis. The graft is a section of healthy\nbone taken from another part of your body.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The surgeon first removes the bone\nwith the poor blood supply from the hip and then replaces it with the\nblood-vessel-rich bone from another site, such as the fibula, the smaller bone\nlocated in the lower leg.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Core decompression\nachieves the best results when osteonecrosis is diagnosed in its early stages,\nbefore the bone collapses. In many of these cases, the bone heals and regains\nits blood supply after core decompression.&nbsp;\n&nbsp;It takes a few months for the\nbone to heal, and during this time, a walker or crutches will be needed to\nprevent putting stress on the damaged bone.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When osteonecrosis is\ndiagnosed after collapse of the bone, core decompression is not usually\nsuccessful in preventing further collapse. In this situation, the patient is\nbest treated with a total hip replacement, which relieves pain and restores\nfunction in &nbsp;95% of patients.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: cyan;\">Bone reshaping &nbsp;</span>-In this procedure, a wedge of bone is removed\nabove or below a weight-bearing joint, to help shift your weight off the\ndamaged bone. Bone reshaping might allow you to postpone joint replacement.&nbsp; Recovery can be a lengthy process, requiring\nseveral months of very limited activities.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This procedure is most effective for\npatients with early-stage osteonecrosis and those with a small area of affected\nbone.&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Osteotomy &nbsp;is a surgery that involves taking out a piece\nof bone, usually a wedge, to reposition the bone so that the tissue lacking\nblood supply (avascular area) bears less weight than an adjacent healthy area.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The standard technique\nis to take extra bone from one part of your body (harvest) and move (graft) it\nto another part of your body. This type of graft is called an autograft.&nbsp; Many surgeons use bone that is harvested from\na donor or cadaver. This type of graft is typically acquired through a bone\nbank. Like other organs, bone can be donated upon death. There are also several\nsynthetic bone grafts available today.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: cyan;\">Joint replacement.</span> If your\ndiseased bone has already collapsed or other treatment options aren't helping,\nyou might need surgery to replace the damaged parts of your joint with plastic\nor metal parts. Arthroplasty or total joint replacement is the treatment of\nchoice in late-stage osteonecrosis and when the joint is destroyed. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-P2vkROFld0s/V1VhkbdRwhI/AAAAAAABJt0/QgLpB8mmhDQP5i2G0tBAjTKWc7zMF0q-gCLcB/s1600/hip-joint-replacemddsent.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-P2vkROFld0s/V1VhkbdRwhI/AAAAAAABJt0/QgLpB8mmhDQP5i2G0tBAjTKWc7zMF0q-gCLcB/s640/hip-joint-replacemddsent.jpg\" width=\"470\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Total joint replacement, or sometimes femoral\nhead resurfacing, is often recommended for people for whom other efforts to\npreserve the joint have failed. Total hip replacement is successful in\nrelieving pain and restoring function in &nbsp;95 percent of patients.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is considered one\nof the most successful operations in all of medicine. In a total hip\nreplacement, both the head of the femur and the socket are replaced with an\nartificial device.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: cyan;\">Regenerative medicine\ntreatment.</span> Bone marrow aspirate and concentration is a novel procedure that in\nthe future might be appropriate for early stage avascular necrosis of the hip.\nStem cells are harvested from your bone marrow.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">During surgery a core of dead\nhip bone is removed and stem cells inserted in its place, potentially allowing\nfor growth of new bone. The stem cells used in our experimental therapy are\nMesenchymal stem cells, which are derived from your own bone marrow.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They use\nconcentrated autologous bone marrow and platelet-rich plasma (PRP) as adjuvants\nto minimally invasive decompression to treat patients with early-stage\nAVN.&nbsp;&nbsp; After surgeons decompress the\nfemoral head, adult mesenchymal stem cells obtained from the iliac crest and\nplatelet-rich plasma are injected into the area of osteonecrosis.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;After this\nprocedure, patients are discharged from the hospital using crutches to assist\nwith ambulation as tolerated for approximately two weeks. <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The combination of hip\ndecompression and injection of mesenchymal stem cells into the necrotic lesion\nprovides satisfactory results in patients with early-stage AVN and can lead to\ncomplete resolution of the necrotic lesion .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/MDGnUvgiepQ/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/MDGnUvgiepQ?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: red; text-decoration: none;\">June 6, 2016 at 11:08 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_57MC\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nTALKING ABOUT SYSTEM CHANGES<br />\n<br />\nwhat do you see when you google YATRA DOT COM on page 1 ?<br />\n<br />\nAT SEA , I WAS SUCCESSFUL BECAUSE I REFUSED TO APPLY BAND AID , WHEN MY BOSSES WANTED IT.<br />\n<br />\nI SAID--NO-- WE DO SYSTEM CHANGE , SO THAT WE DO NOT GET BLED EVER AGAIN<br />\n<br />\nPREVENTION IS BETTER THAN CURE AGAIN AND AGAIN AND AGAIN<br />\n<br />\nin the case of yatra dot com they went around cheating merrily - it goes on --<br />\n<br />\nwho cares !</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Amardeep Singh Mann<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">January 12, 2018 at 3:20 AM<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Hello Captain,<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Can you please let us know the effect of Human Albumin from aborted fetus's on humans and the environment? They apparently put this into alot of products, especially vaccines.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Many thanks.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">##############<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Capt. font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">I HAVE SAID SEVERAL TIMES THAT VACCINES IN THRID WORLD NATION ARE MODIFIED TO REDUCE FERTILITY IN BOTH MALES AND FEMALE \u2013AND TO REDUCE BRAIN POWER<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Aborted human fetal proteins, altered DNA material, and GM human albumin is used by EVIL pharma.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">IN KERALA WE NEVER HAD AUTISM BEFORE WE STARTED COMPULSORY VACCINATIONS LIKE MMR<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">MMR vaccine contains GM human protein, and has caused vaccine-induced neurological damage in Indian babies\u2014all this is hushed up.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">INDIAN BABIES ARE USED AS GUINEA PIGS WITH CONNIVANCE OF DOCTORS WHO ARE SENT ON PEDOPHILE SEXUAL JAUNTS TO THAILAND AND EUROPE .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Cell culture techniques to produce vaccine viruses in human cell strains is kept as a closely guarded secret<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Vaccine manufacturers do not test their products for mutagenic potential. The long term adverse effects of using aborted fetal cells for vaccine production are virtually unknown, yet millions of these vaccines are administered every day.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Cell cultures involve growing cells in a culture vessel. A primary cell culture consists of cells taken directly from living tissue and never subcultivated, and may contain multiple types of cells such as fibroblasts, epithelial, and endothelial cells.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">A cell strain is a cell culture that contains only one type of cell in which the cells are normal and have a finite capacity to replicate. Cell strains can be made by taking subcultures from an original, primary culture until only one type remains.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Primary cultures can be manipulated in many different ways in order to isolate a single type of cell; spinning the culture in a centrifuge can separate large cells from small ones, for example. An immortalized cell line is a cell culture of a single type of cell that can reproduce indefinitely.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Normally, cells are subject to the Hayflick Limit, a rule named for cell biologist Leonard Hayflick, PhD. Hayflick determined that a population of normal human cells will reproduce only a finite number of times before they cease to reproduce. However some cells in culture have undergone a mutation, or they have been manipulated in the laboratory, so that they reproduce indefinitely.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Rubella vaccines developed using duck embryo cells and dog kidney cells. Polio vaccines developed using primary monkey kidney cells were contaminated with simian viruses: this was one of the reasons researchers began using the normal human cell strain WI-38 in the first place.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">There are two particular fetal cell lines that have been heavily used in vaccine development. They are named according to the laboratory facilities where they were developed. One cell line is known as WI-38, developed at the Wistar Institute in Philadelphia, PA. The other is MRC-5, developed for the Medical Research Council in England.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">CONTINUED TO 2<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">CONTINUED FROM 1-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">MRC-5 cells are used to produce several vaccines including MMR, Varicella and Polio. Infected MRC-5 cells secrete the virus, and are cultured in large volumes..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">MRC-5 cell line was developed in September 1966 from lung tissue taken from a 14 week fetus aborted for psychiatric reason from a 27 year old physically healthy woman.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">MRC-5 (Medical Research Council cell strain 5) is a diploid human cell culture line composed of fibroblasts<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">MRC-5 cell strain ( fetal lung cells) was developed, using Hayflick's technology, in 1970 at the Medical Research Center in the United Kingdom. It should be noted that Hayflick's methods involved establishing a huge bank of WI-38 and MRC-5 cells that, while not capable of infinitely replicating like immortal cell lines<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Several vaccines currently available in the United States were developed using animal cell strains, primarily using cells from African green monkeys. These include vaccines against Japanese encephalitis, rotavirus, polio, and smallpox.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Indian babies have been sacrificed for use in the research and development of vaccines. DNA from these aborted fetuses is present in vaccines<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">MAXIMUM BRIBES FOR INDIAN MINISTERS , BABUS COME FROM EVIL PHARMA VIA SHELL COMPANIES.. text-decoration: none;\">June 4, 2016 at 9:50 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_72MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nDear Captain,<br />\nIs the concept of Shad-Dharshana (six dharsanas of Hinduism) a true concept or fabricated myth? Some so called 'scholars' are claiming that Nirishvara Dharshana(rejection of ishwara) is also part of shad Dharsanas. They go on to say that a balance of all the six dharsanas is required for a 'strong' society like balance of yin-yang, rajas-tamas-sattwa. Please throw some light on this.</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_72MN\" kind=\"m\"><br /><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-1897621665\" style=\"display: inline;\"></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nir-Ishvara-Vada=Atheism<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There is no room for\natheism in Sanatana Dharma.&nbsp; The FAKE Nirishvaravada\nwas started by the FAKE mutts of Jew Rothschild and carried forward by an agent\nof Rothschild EVR Periyar while still calling themselves Hindus. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Original Buddism of\nBuddha born in 1900 BC, and Jainism of Mahavira born in 4500 BC, embraced the existence\nof God.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Later the white invader\nused his resources and created three FAKE schools of thought are commonly\nreferred to as nastika for rejecting the doctrine of Vedas: Jainism, Buddhism\nand C\u0101rv\u0101ka.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Though nastika, meaning heterodox, refers to the non-belief in the\nVedas rather than non-belief in God, all these schools were made to reject the\nnotion of a creator god. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hinduism is a religion,\nbut also a way of life and a philosophy.&nbsp;\nThe white invader cooked up BULL that among the various schools of Hindu\nphilosophy, Samkhya, Yoga and Mimamsa while not rejecting either the Vedas or\nthe Brahman , typically reject a &nbsp;creator\nGod. This is nonsense.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The FAKE Mimamsa schooll\ncreated and back dated by Jew Rothschild argued that the Vedas were written\ndown my mortals and NOT picked off by seers from aakshik records.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Rothschild historians\nwrote that Hindu atheists accept Hinduism more as a \"way of life\"\nthan a religion. This is nonsense as there can be NO Sanatana Dharma without\ncreator GOD.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The white invader LIED\nusing his FAKE mutts that technically , in Hindu philosophy the term \u0100stika\nrefers only to acceptance of authority of Vedas, not belief in the existence of\nGod. This is a immoral LIE.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The white invader LIED\nwhen he equated \u0100stika is sometimes translated as \"theist\" and\nN\u0101stika as \"atheist\", assuming the rejection of Vedas to be synonymous\nto the rejection of God.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Jew Rothschild used\nVivekananda to push it further .&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vivekananda wrote \"<i>As certain religions\nof the world say that a man who does not believe in a Personal God outside of\nhimself is an atheist, so the Vedanta says, a man who does not believe in\nhimself is an atheist. Not believing in the glory of our own soul is what the Vedanta\ncalls atheism\u201d</i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Rig Veda, the\noldest of the Vedas, endorses creator GOD.&nbsp;\n&nbsp;The white invader wrote that\nNsadiya Sukta does NOT accept a creator God. This is bcause the white mind is\npetty and shallow.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">To buttress their&nbsp; point , the quote a verse in Nasadiya Sukta\n(Creation Hymn) in the tenth chapter of the Rig Veda for which lot of white\nIndopiles wrote the meaning&nbsp; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">What was described\nabove, and what below this screen?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Below was the strength\nof creative discipline<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; Who\nin this world may declare it! <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/PSb8SvC93Ws/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/PSb8SvC93Ws?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; mso-list: l0 level1 lfo1; text-indent: -.25in;\">\n<!--[if !supportLists]--><b><span style=\"color: blue;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 16.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">1)<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;; mso-list: l0 level1 lfo1; text-indent: -.25in;\">\n<!--[if !supportLists]--><b><span style=\"color: blue;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 16.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">2)<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;; font-size: 7pt; font-stretch: normal; line-height: normal;\">&nbsp; </span></span><!--[endif]--><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 16.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">DVAITA \u2013 THE\nTRINITY<o:p></o:p></span></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoListParagraphCxSpLast\" style=\"line-height: 200%; mso-list: l0 level1 lfo1; text-indent: -.25in;\">\n<!--[if !supportLists]--><b><span style=\"color: blue;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 16.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">3)<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;; font-size: 7pt; font-stretch: normal; line-height: normal;\">&nbsp; </span></span><!--[endif]--></span></b><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 16.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\">SANKHYA \u2013\nTHE PLAY </span></b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoListParagraphCxSpLast\" style=\"line-height: 200%; mso-list: l0 level1 lfo1; text-indent: -.25in;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 16.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 16.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">ALL THIS IS BEYOND PETTY AND SHALLOW MINDS !<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 16.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/09/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/09/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The white invader\nwrote:&nbsp; \u201cThe Brihadaranyaka, Isha,\nMundaka (in which Brahman is everything and \"no-thing\") and\nespecially the Chandogya Upanishads have also been interpreted as atheistic\nbecause of their stress on the subjective self\u201d . &nbsp;&nbsp;This is nonsense .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mimamsa was a\nrealistic, pluralistic school of philosophy which was concerned with the\nexegesis of the Vedas. The core text of the school was the Purva Mimamsa Sutras\nof Jaimini .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mimamsa philosophers\nbelieved that the revelation of the Vedas was sacred, authorless\n(apaurusheyatva) and infallible, and that it was essential to preserve the\nsanctity of the Vedic ritual to maintain dharma (cosmic order).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201cAs a consequence of\nthe belief in sanctity of the ritual, Mimamsas rejected the notion of God in\nany form. Later commentators of the Mimamsa sutras such as Prabh\u0101kara (c. 7th\ncentury CE) advanced arguments against the existence of God.The early Mimamsa\nnot only did not accept God but said that human action itself was enough to\ncreate the necessary circumstances for the enjoyment of its fruits.\u201d This is POISON\nINJECTED.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Prabhakara , Kumaril\nBhatta and Salikanatha of the Mima\u1e43sa tradition never existed. They are FAKE backdated creations.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The white historian wrote that Samkhya philosophy\nis &nbsp;atheistic. This is NONSENSE.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The earliest surviving\nauthoritative text on classical Samkhya philosophy is the Samkhyakarika (c.\n350\u2013450 CE) of Isvarakrishna. The Samkhyakarika has NOT been understood by the\nwhite man.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Samkhyakarika is\nNOT silent on the existence of GOD.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Samkhya Sutra (14th\nc. CE) and its commentaries which explicitly attempt to disprove god's existence\nthrough reasoned argument is POISON INJECTED.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Charvaka , a\nmaterialistic and atheistic school of Indian philosophy, is FAKE .&nbsp; This philosophy rejects karma/ moksha/\nre-birth &nbsp;theory which is the bed rock of\nSanatana Dharma.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Amish Tripathi who\ndenigrated Lord Shiva said that he supports Carvaka philosophy, which was\ncreated and backdated by Jew Rothschild.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">Below: Deepak Chopra ( who endorsed this book ) is NOT a spokesman for Hinduism. &nbsp;He must lay off !</b></span><br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">\u201cThe Shiva Trilogy has\nbecome the fastest selling book series in the history of Indian publishing,\nwith 2.5 million copies in print and over Rs 70 crore in sales.[16] Forbes\nIndia has ranked him among the top 100 celebrities in India four times in a\nrow, in 2012, 2013, 2014 and 2015.[17][18][19][20] [21]Amish was also selected\nas an Eisenhower Fellow, an exclusive programme for outstanding leaders from\naround the world.[22] The trilogy is a fantasy re-imagining of the Indian deity\nShiva's life and adventures.( <span style=\"color: red;\"><b>NOW HE GIVES BULL , THAT IT IS A FANTASY\u2014HEY, TRY\n&nbsp;YOUR FANTASY WITH ALLAH AND YOU WILL BE\nDEAD BEFORE THE SUN GOES DOWN</b></span> ) The Immortals of Meluha and The Secret of the\nNagas have been released in UK through Jo Fletcher Books (an imprint of Quercus\nBooks) in January 2013 and November 2013 respectively. Amish Tripathi has\nrecently been listed as one of India's \"New Icons\" by the DNA\nnewspaper in its eighth anniversary special.[32] Amish has also been awarded\nSociety Young Achievers Award for Literature[33]He also won the Communicator of\nthe Year Award 2014, instituted by the Public Relations Council of India\n(PRCI).[34] PRCI, the premier body of PR, Media and HR professionals and\nacademicians, has announced the award to Amish at the 8th Global Communication\nConclave in Mumbai. Amish Tripathi was named Man of the Year 2013 by Radio\nOne.[9] He believes that religiosity and liberalism go hand-in-hand in\nIndia.[50] He is a believer of God, per se, and worships pictures of the Muslim\nKaaba, Mother Mary, Jesus Christ, Prophet Zarathustra, Gautam Buddha among\nsymbols of other religions.[50][dead link]\u201d ( from Wikipedia )</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; When he went out to look, he saw his disciple Kabir sitting before the cow, which was dead.<br />\n\"Gurudeva, I found this cow here, so I thought that I could get milk from it,\" was Kabir's explanation.<br />\nRamanand didn't know whether to laugh or cry. THEY DON\u2019T DARE TO WRITE FOUL LIES AGAINST ISLAM . .<br />\n<br />\nVishnu had taken several avatars in the past-<br />\n3. Varaha (the boar- to kill reborn JAYA or Hiranyaksha )<br />\n4. Narasimha (the human-lion- to kill reborn VIJAYA or Hiranyakashipu )<br />\n7. Lord Rama (the perfect man, king of Ayodha- to kill reborn JAYA/ VIJAYA or Ravana and Kumbhakarna)<br />\n8. Lord Krishna (the divine statesman- to kill reborn JAYA/ VIJAYA or Shishupala and Dantavakra )<br />\n<br />\nNow who is Jaya and Vijaya?<br />\n<br />\nThey were the biggest devotees of Lord Vishnu , and were his celestial demi-god gatekeepers as they earned Vishnu\u2019s trust and love.<br />\n<br />\nThe 4 Kumaras, Sanaka, Sanandana, Sanatana, and Sanatkumara were the manasaputras of Brahma -sons born from the mind or thought power of Brahma.<br />\n<br />\nSeveral people came daily to visit Lord Vishnu at Vaikunta and it was Jaya's and Vijaya's job to allow every person who had grievance to see the Lord.<br />\n<br />\nJaya and Vijaya blocked the four Kuraras from entering Vaikunta, pissing them off .<br />\n<br />\nThey knew that Lord Vishnu's time was precious and could not be wasted. The doorkeepers took their job very seriously.<br />\n<br />\nJaya suddenly realised who these four children were and they were not children. He felt scared, very scared. ' Forgive us, you are the four Kumaras. You are the sons of Lord Brahma...' He said faintly kneeling before the four children.<br />\n<br />\nSanatkumar spoke, ' For this we curse you... Jaya and Vijaya. You are so full of yourselves . You think vainly that just because you are gate keepers , you are god \u201c<br />\n<br />\nJaya and Vijaya looked terrified and they requested \u201c'Please do not curse us..\u201d<br />\n<br />\nMeanwhile inside Vaikunta, Lord Vishnu heard the commotion , rather he knew this would happen as ordained. He rushed out to the gate and saw his dear doorkeepers kneeling at the feet of the four Kumaras shaking in fear .<br />\n<br />\nLord Vishnu heard Sanatkumar complete his curse. '...You will no longer be gods. You will be born on earth as ordinary humans and live like ordinary people...'<br />\n<br />\nJaya and Vijaya knelt there stunned , unable to figure out what next. Suddenly they saw Vishnu and started explaining.<br />\n<br />\nLord Vishnu held up his hand and silenced them, 'I know.. no explanations are necessary...' Lord Vishnu was touched... He felt proud of them. He said 'I cannot take back the curse, but I can give you a clear choice...' ( Vishnu knew what the answer would be )<br />\n<br />\nHe said 'Either you can take seven births on earth as my devotees.....or take three births as my enemies...'<br />\n<br />\nJaya and Vijaya both looked at each other . Seven births was too long .<br />\n<br />\nAs one they said, 'We will be born three times as your enemy and come back to you my Lord...'<br />\n<br />\nLord Vishnu laughed, \u201c I will incarnate on the earth to kill you, all the three times, but you will attain moksha in the end \u201d<br />\n<br />\nHe finished and hugged Jaya and Vijaya, touched by their love and devotion.<br />\n<br />\nIt was after this that Jaya and Vijaya were first born as Hiranyaksha and Hiranyakasipu.<br />\n<br />\nVISHNU IN NARASIMHA AVATAR KILLED HIRANYAKSHIPU<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2--</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_70MN\" kind=\"m\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_70BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_70B_box\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_71B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom-width: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c3968803700733224163\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_71M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">Capt. These are\nderived from the name of deity; for example, deity Durga yields dum and deity\nGanesha yields gam.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;
