The seven main ones are:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Gayatri: 3 padas of 8\nsyllables containing 24 syllables in each stanza.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ushnuk : 4 padas of 7\nsyllables containing 28 syllables in each stanza.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Anustubh: 4 padas of 8\nsyllables containing 32 syllables in each stanza. This is the typical shloka of\nclassical Sanskrit poetry<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Brihati : 4 padas (8 +\n8 + 12 + 8) containing 36 syllables in each stanza.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Pankti : 4 padas\n(sometimes 5 padas) containing 40 syllables in each stanza.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Tristubh: 4 padas of 11\nsyllables containing 44 syllabes in each stanza<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Jagati: 4 padas of 12\nsyllables containing 48 syllables in each stanza<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The mantra has got a\nBeeja or seed. The seed is a significant word, or series of words, which gives\na special power to the Mantra. The Beeja is the essence of the Mantra. This\nrepresents the sound string defined by the Seers as being the repository of\nauditory energy sources.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Beeja gives the\nmantra in which it is used, its special power of self-generation and effects.\nJust as within a seed is hidden within tree, so too, the energy of the mantra\nis resident in the seed on which it is based. This helps the mantra to manifest\nitself into spiritual consciousness.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/NKTc4kSs1tg/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/NKTc4kSs1tg?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sun (Surya)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Om hram hreem hraum sah\nsuryaya namah<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Moon (Chandra)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Om shram shreem shraum\nsah chandraya namah<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Om bram breem braum sah\nbudhaya namah<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Om gram greem graum sah\ngurave namah<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ketu<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Om shram shreem shraum\nsah ketave namah.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sound frequencies have\nbeen used to stimulate new cellular growth, resolve tumors, dissolve calcium\ndeposits, stimulate new neurological development, deliver nourishment,\ndetoxify, resolve paralysis, remove plaque and tooth decay, act as a carrier\nfrequency to deliver higher forms of knowledge and information, even scan and\nharvest information. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sonocytology is the\nstudy of cell sounds. Where there is vibration, there is sound and vice\nversa.&nbsp; Modern science has slowly begun\nto realize the benefits of sound mantras used in Ayurveda fore body cell\nrejuvenation.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">While literally\neverything is vibrating, different things vibrate at different rates or\nfrequencies. Some frequencies are perceived as light, some as sound, some as\ncolor, and some as solid matter. The rate at which something vibrates\ndetermines how dense it is and what we perceive it to be. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The human ear can\ndiscern only a very narrow band between 20 Hz to 20000 Hz.&nbsp; The rest is inaudible. This is why NO cosmic\nsound can be heard by the human ear. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">These cosmic sounds\nwere heard by 12 strand DNA maharishis in their spiritual trances which\nbroadened their sense spectrums.&nbsp; However\nour brain can register the vibrations.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Diviners use OM\nresonance to find water in arid areas.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The mantric power of Om\nemanates not only from its sound vibrations, but also from the inner attitude\nof the speaker-- his spiritual purity and his freedom from worldliness.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The earth vibrates at\n7.83 Hz and so does OM. When you blow a conch your body must be erect, as per\nthe spirit level in the inner ear cochlea, to balance right and left brain\nlobes.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The spiral in the inner\near also follows the Fibonacci series. Scalar waves and sound waves are\nLONGITUDINAL.&nbsp; Rest are all transverse.\nSpirals which follow the Golden mean and Fibonacci series can create scalar\nwaves.&nbsp; Which means a conch can create scalar\nwaves.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The sound of the sea\nwhen you listen to the conch held to your ear is the sound of the Zero Point\nField or Scalar Field or Brahman or OM.&nbsp;&nbsp;\nIn Hindu temples before and after a puja or arti the shank is\nblown.&nbsp; Lord Shiva is also known as Shankara.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Dead cells emitted a\nlow rumbling like radio static. Distinguishing between the sound signatures of\nhealthy and diseased cells WILL be a part of the medicine of the future.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the sixth fetal\nmonth, life inside the womb is full of sounds that the ear is capable of\nhearing. The uterus resounds with the sounds of the heart beating\n(approximately 50-60 beats per minute) and the blood swooshing through the\narteries, the wavelike cadence of the breath (approximately 1,215 cycles per\nminute), and the external sounds and voices muted by the amniotic fluid. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Before we are even born,\nwe are attuned to the rhythms and sounds around us.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As per our 7000 year\nold Vedas sound creates, organizes and forms all the basic fundamental shapes\nfound throughout the known universe.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sound operates through\nthe law of Resonance. Resonance eliminates the limitations of the \"sender\nand receiver dynamic.\"&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Resonance\nis where two become one, where minds join.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Resonance is, in\nitself, a state of awareness and experiential knowing far beyond concept and\nmental, cognitive thinking. On the vibration field-form-body-time level,\nresonance is the experiential state of Oneness.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sound has the ability\nto affect whatever forms it comes into contact with by exposing that form to a\ndifferent rate of frequency vibration.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sound has the ability\nto bring this place back into Oneness by changing its rate of vibration through\nsympathetic vibration - Resonance.&nbsp;&nbsp;\nDepending on the frequencies being used, sound vibratory resonance can\nfacilitate accessing a state of understanding and knowing without the need for\nlimits, fears and defenses.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sound waves can travel\nbelow the order of mental cognitive defense structures and deliver a deeper\nexperiential state of harmony. Resonance is not a mental idea. It is a visceral\nknowing-feeling state beyond question. We call this Sound Frequency Healing. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">For any healing to be\ncomplete, it needs to take place at all levels \u2013 the body, the mind and the\nspirit. The smallest particles known to man are vibrations.&nbsp; Thoughts are vibrations.&nbsp; Words are vibrations.&nbsp; Sounds are vibrations.&nbsp; Light is a vibration.&nbsp; Our planet is a vibration.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Our entire universe and\neverything within it (seen and unseen) is a vibrating mass of atoms and\nsubatomic particles. If the hydrogen bonding angles of one molecule are\naltered, those in the other molecules might be expected to follow suit (as in a\ndomino effect).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">When a mantra is\nchanted , it vibrates the brain matter and connects new neural circuits. This\neffect comes after repeating the mantra for a long period of time and bringing\nin the resonance effect in the brain.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; ka,</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nTHEY CAN GET MOKSHA ONLY IF THEIR KARMIC BAGGAGE IS ZERO.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br />THERE IS NO ESCAPE FROM LAWS OF KARMA.</span></b></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">IT IS ENERGY BASED -AND ROOTED IN QUANTUM PHYSICS .</span></b></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nTHE PROBLEM WITH SANATANA DHARMA IS THAT WE HAVE ALLOWED SANSKRIT LANGUAGE PUNDITS TO INTERPRET THE RELIGION</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nTHIS IS EQUIVALENT TO ENGLISH LITERATURE MASTERS INTERPRETING MATH / &nbsp;PHYSICS--JUST BECAUSE THE TEXT BOOK IS WRITTEN IN ENGLISH</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nMOST OF THE INDOPHILES DO NOT EVEN UNDERSTAND SANSKRIT-- THEY KEEP MONIER DICTIONARY WITH THEM</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\">THESE ARE NOT PEOPLE WHO CAN SEE THE INVISIBLE OF FEEL THE INTANGIBLE.</span></b></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></b></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\">YOU CAN UNDERSTAND SANATANA DHARMA ONLY IF THE SPIRIT IS INVOLVED ALONG WITH THE MIND.</span></b></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nKORAN IS MISINTERPRETED BECAUSE PEOPLE WITH POOR QUALITY BRAINS (ALONG WITH AN ULTERIOR AGENDA) ARE IN CHARGE OF GLEANING THE VERSES.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nWhen man dies his karma lives and creates for itself another carrier.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nNobel prize winner Erwin Schroedinger had written that only Vedantic jnana represented the true view of reality.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nHe was very keen on being the dean at Department of Physics, Allahabad University in India -but it was not to be, as he had health problems.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nTHE POPE GOT HIM BURIED ( ON PAPER ) WITH GREAT FAN FARE THOUGH HE WAS A HINDU AND NOT A CHRISTIAN --AND HE HAD WRITTEN IN HIS WILL THAT HE WISHED TO BE CREMATED.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nHIS FAKE GRAVE LIES IN ALPBACH AUSTRIA IN A CATHOLIC CEMETERY , WITH THE QUANTUM WAVE EQUATION INSCRIBED ON IT.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nSchrodinger did not believe that it will be possible to demonstrate the unity of consciousness by logical arguments. One must make imaginative leap guided by communion with nature and the persuasion of analogies.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nWHEN INTELLECTUAL GIANTS LIKE TESLA AND SCHRODINGER HAVE APPROVED VEDANTA, DO WE NEED TO CARE FOR DUFFERS LIKE WENDY DONGGER OR SHELDON POLLOCK ?</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nThe whole of the West ridiculed the power of Consciousness of Hindu Vedanta, as Coolie verses and mumbo jumbo--about human intention and coconut breaking in rituals.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nIt was Schrodinger and his fellow scientist W Heisenberg who first said \"Quantum theory will NOT look ridiculous to people who have read Indian Vedanta\"</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nThanks to the theory of ERP Quantum Entanglement, originally asserted by Albert Einstein and two fellow scientists , Boris Podolsky and Nathan Rosen, we now have proof that what Vedanta had been saying for 9000 years is true.We are all connected.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nWe are all One, sharing a consciousness with the entire universe, perhaps even many universes.</div>\n<b><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">LAWS OF KARMA ARE ENERGY BASED.</span></b><br />\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nQuantum Entanglement tells us is that particles of energy communicate with one another. And it doesn't matter if the two particles are ten feet, ten miles or ten thousand miles away. They instantly communicate with one another. This is at the heart of Vedanta.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nThis not only indicates that energy is thinking stuff, it tells us each particle also knows what energy particles elsewhere are doing. That means all energy, everywhere, is connected. And since we are made of energy, as is everything else, that means we are connected, too.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nNo matter what we think our circumstances are, our assumption is correct because energy is going to make us right by picking up on those thoughts we hold on to for dear life and playing them right back at us as our reality. .</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nIf you think life is a struggle, then life will be a struggle.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nCONTINUED TO 2-</div>\n</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_78MN\" kind=\"m\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_78BR\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_78B_box\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_79B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom-width: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c1803489151206508799\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_79M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/06/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and.html?showComment=1464926299168#c1803489151206508799\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">June 3, 2016 at 9:28 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_79MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1-</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nIf you think you must live a life of limitation, pulling yourself along a track of fate from payslip to payslip, then that track of fate is where you'll stay.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nNo matter what our past thoughts may have created, the moment we begin thinking thoughts of wealth, health, prosperity and abundance, those little bundles of energy will pick up on that new signal and scramble to become physical matter mimicking our thoughts.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nDon't forget that EVERYTHING is made up of these amazing energy bundles that not only think, but respond to our thoughts, as well. It isn't just quantum physics that tells us that, either. Vedic sages have told for 30 millenniums and wrote down 7000 years ago.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nEvery form and process you see in nature is the visible expression of a thought in Original Substance.. We live in a thought world, which is part of a thought universe.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nYou are an energy sculptor, an artist, a creator.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nYou literally and specifically create your world by the power of your thinking. And once you create something with your thoughts, your attention to it keeps it there.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\">BRAHMAN SHEARS OFF PIECES OF HIS OWN FIELD (SOULS) LOWERS THE FREQUENCY AND SENDS IT ON EARTH. &nbsp; &nbsp;THIS SOUL EXPERIENCES LIFE --EVERYTHING FROM BACTERIA TO PLANT TO BIRD TO ANIMAL TO HUMAN. WITH EVERY STEP OF EVOLUTION THE SOUL INCREASES ITS FREQUENCY .</span></b></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><b>ONCE THE SOUL ENTERS A CONSCIOUS HUMAN , IT HOPS AFTER DEATH FROM ASTRA LAYERS ONE TO SEVEN.</b></span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">AT ASTRAL LAYER SEVEN THE SOULs FREQUENCY IS RAISED TO THE FREQUENCY OF THE MOTHER FIELD OF BRAHMAN AND HENCE MERGES --THE SOUL IF NOW PART OF GOD, NEVER TO BE RE INDUCTED AGAIN ON EARTH.</span></b></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nYou are the creator and, along with God, the co-creator of your world and of everything surrounding you. You are the cause that produces the effect. The thoughts you think repeatedly, the emotions you feel and hold onto and will not let go of; these thoughts and feelings are constantly creating your world, day in and day out, minute by minute, second by second.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nYou do become what you think about. Because your thoughts, feelings and emotions created it, you're responsible for it. Not your parents, or your spouse, or your children, or your job, or your economy, or your locale. Not anything at all except you. Just you! And what you don't like, YOU can change by doing nothing more than changing your mind.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nNo matter how it might look, no matter how it might feel: It is not solid, it is not real. It is energy, pure cosmic energy, manifested into matter by the continued focus of your thinking--by your consciousness. It is countless little particles of energy conforming to your thoughts because that is what energy does. It becomes what you think about most.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nSchrodinger wrote in his book Meine Weltansicht:</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n\u201cThis life of yours which you are living is not merely a piece of this entire existence, but in a certain sense the whole; only this whole is not so constituted that it can be surveyed in one single glance. This, as we know, is what the Brahmins express in that sacred, mystic formula which is yet really so simple and so clear; TAT TWAM ASI - the last words exchanged between a guru and his shishya before they part , never to meet each other again --the final convocation ritual.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nThe Upanishads were collectively considered amongst the 100 most influential books ever written by INTELLECTUAL SUPERMEN like Thoreau, Kant, Schopenhauer, Schrodinger, Werner Heisenberg , Tesla, Einstein etc.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nSO WE HINDUS REALLY NEED TO CARE WHAT BR AMBEDKAR, EVR PERIYAR, MAHATMA PHULE SAAB, KANCHA ILAIH SQUEAK, DHABHOLKAR, KALBURI, PANSARE etc SAY .</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n\u092c\u094d\u0930\u0939\u094d\u092e\u093e\u0928\u0928\u094d\u0926\u0902 \u092a\u0930\u092e\u0938\u0941\u0916\u0926\u0902 \u0915\u0947\u0935\u0932\u0902 \u091c\u094d\u091e\u093e\u0928\u092e\u0942\u0930\u094d\u0924\u093f\u0902</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n\u0926\u094d\u0935\u0928\u094d\u0926\u094d\u0935\u093e\u0924\u0940\u0924\u0902 \u0917\u0917\u0928\u0938\u0926\u0943\u0936\u0902 \u0924\u0924\u094d\u0935\u092e\u0938\u094d\u092f\u093e\u0926\u093f\u0932\u0915\u094d\u0937\u094d\u092f\u092e\u094d ||</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nI prostrate myself before that Guru, the Bliss of Brahman, the bestower of Supreme Happiness, who is Knowledge absolute, transcending the pairs of opposites, expansive like the sky, the goal indicated by the great sayings like TAT TWAM ASI \u201cThou art That\u201d</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\nMY REVELATIONS NOW JUMP TO <b><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\">20.30 %</span></b><br />\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nWELL, WELL , WHAT DO THE HALF WITS KNOW ?</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\ncapt ajit vadakayil</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n..</div>\n</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_80b+seedEiCD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_80b+seedEiCD\" kind=\"d\" style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n</span>\n<br />\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #33aaff;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/06/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and.html?showComment=1464928342095#c8828048988514023768\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">June 3, 2016 at 10:02 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_81MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nTHE WHITE INVADER HAS INJECTED POISON IN OUR VEDAS, UPANISHADS AND PURANAS.<br />\n<br />\nNO DOCUMENT CAN BE TRUSTED UNLESS CARBON DATED TO MORE THAN 400 YEARS OF AGE.<br />\n<br />\nNO PHOTOCOPY OR SCAN CAN BE TRUSTED.<br />\n<br />\nLORD KRISHNA DID NOT HAVE A MISTRESS NAMED RADHA<br />\n<br />\nLORD RAMA DID NOT KICK HIS PREGNANT WIFE SITA TO THE FOREST.<br />\n<br />\nLORD SHIVA DID NOT EAT DEAD CORPSES NOT DID HE GO AROUND SCREWING WIVES OF SAPT RISHIS WHO WERE MEDITATING. NOR IS SHIVA A HIJRA ( TRANSGENDER )<br />\n<br />\nTHERE WAS NO SATI<br />\n<br />\nTHERE WAS NO ANIMAL OR HUMAN SACRIFICE IN HINDU TEMPLES<br />\n<br />\nBRAHMA DID NOT COMMIT INCEST<br />\n<br />\nTHERE IS NO SUPERSTITION IN SANATANA DHARMA<br />\n<br />\nINDOPHILES AND COMMIE JNU PROFESSORS COOK UP IMMORAL STORIES HOW SHIVA , VISHNU AND BRAHMA HELD RIDICULOUS COMPETITIONS , TO SEE WHO IS STRONGER -- ALL OUR GODS EXCEPT VISHNU AVATARS ARE COSMIC FORCES FROM MACRO TO MICRO LEVEL.<br />\n<br />\nREAD THE POST BELOW TO UNDERSTAND THE GLORY OF HINDUISM. NO MORTAL HAS UNDERSTOOD THE GLORY OF SANATANA DHARMA SINCE ADI SHANKARACHARYA 4000 YEARS AGO.<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\">THERE ARE THREE TEMPLATES- &nbsp; &nbsp;ADVAITA (FIELD), &nbsp; &nbsp;DVAITA ( TRINITY ) &nbsp; AND &nbsp;SAMKHYA ( &nbsp;PURUSHA / PRAGATI &nbsp;)&nbsp;</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: blue;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/09/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and.html</span><br />\n<br />\nTHE WHITE INVADER NEVER EXPECTED AN INTERNET AGE , OR A BLOGGER NAMED CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_82b+seedF_SD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_82b+seedF_SD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">BELOW: &nbsp;THE IRON METEORITE IS SHIVA LINGAM, &nbsp;THE STONE WHICH CONTAINS THE SEED (DNA ) .</span></b><br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">EGYPTIAN PYRAMIDS WERE DESIGNED BY ANCIENT INDIANS AND THEY KNOW IT.</span></b><br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">THE WHITE MAN HID THE TRUTH FOR SO LONG , AS THEY WANTED INDIANS TO FEEL THAT WE ARE HEATHEN SAVAGES.</span></b><br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">THE TRUTH IS TILL THE WHITE MAN CAME TO INDIA HE HAS ZERO INVENTIONS AND DISCOVERIES. &nbsp; &nbsp;</span></b><br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">EVERY VESTIGE OF ANCIENT GREEK AND ARAB KNOWLEDGE WAS LIFTED FROM INDIA .</span></b><br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">THE GOD OF EGYPTIANS IN MANs FORM WAS IMHOTEP &nbsp;-- &nbsp;LORD AYYAPPA, THE 9TH AVATAR OF VISHNU</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; Dharma is the\ncementer and sustainer of social life. Self-realisation is the highest\nDharma.&nbsp; Dharma is the heart of Hindu\nethics.&nbsp; God is the centre of\nDharma.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There can be NO Sanatana Dharma without\nfactoring in the CREATOR god.&nbsp; Atheist\nCharavaka school was created and backdated by the white invader.&nbsp;&nbsp; IT is NOT congruent with Sanatana Dharma and\nhence is rejected .&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Can you believe\nthis \u2014Amish Tripathi who threw shit on Lord Shiva made him a sex starved mortal\n,&nbsp; called himself a Charvaka school\nman?&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The moment any man comes in the\nTIME top 100 or gets a Nobel Prize for peace/ literature or a Magsaysay award,\nthe first thing we can think of today is WHAT IS THE CATCH \u2013 WHAT DID HE DO TO\nSCREW THE WATAN.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Rishi Kanada, founder\nof the Vaiseshika system of philosophy, has given the definition of\nDharma, in his Vaiseshika Sutras:&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201cYato-bhyudayanihsreyasa-siddhih sa dharmah.\u201d&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201cThat which leads to the attainment of Abhyudaya (prosperity in this world) and\nNihsreyasa (total cessation of pain and attainment of eternal bliss hereafter)\nis Dharma.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hinduism allows\nabsolute freedom to the rational mind of man . Hinduism never demands an undue\nrestraint upon human conscience,&nbsp; freedom\nof human reason, the freedom of thought, feeling and&nbsp; free will of man.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It allows the widest freedom in matters of\nfaith and worship. It allows absolute freedom to the human reason and heart\nwith regard to questions such as the nature of God, soul, creation, form of\nworship, and goal of life.&nbsp;&nbsp; It does not\nforce or prevent anybody to reflect, investigate, enquire, and cogitate.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hence, all sorts of religious faiths,\nvarious forms of worship or Sadhana, diverse kinds of rituals and customs, have\nfound their honourable place side by side within Hinduism, and are cultured and\ndeveloped in harmonious relationship with one another.&nbsp;&nbsp; Hinduism does not dogmatically assert that\nthe final emancipation is possible only through its means and not through any\nother.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Dharma alone is the\ngateway to Moksha, to immortality, infinite bliss, supreme peace and highest\nknowledge..&nbsp;&nbsp; Dharma is the first and\nforemost Purushartha.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">What is Dharma in one\nset of circumstances becomes Adharma in another set of circumstances. That is\nthe reason why it is said that the secret of Dharma is extremely profound and\nsubtle.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">WE SHALL NOT SPIN THE\nCHARKHA WHEN THE CHINESE INVADE THE WATAN TO ENSLAVE BHARATMATA \u2014EVEN IF THE CHELAS OF GUJJU NO 1 ( GANDHI\n) WANTS IT SO.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-TUPvq1WNGik/V1FiepzD6eI/AAAAAAABJiA/ISalZdGTysE2cTlpBFuX2ssvzoZiui8xQCLcB/s1600/modi-gandhi_XD012615064750.gif\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"362\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-TUPvq1WNGik/V1FiepzD6eI/AAAAAAABJiA/ISalZdGTysE2cTlpBFuX2ssvzoZiui8xQCLcB/s640/modi-gandhi_XD012615064750.gif\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Lord Krishna says in\nthe Bhagawad Gita 6000 years ago &nbsp;: \u201cLet the scriptures be the authority in determining what\nought to be done and what ought not to be done\u201d (Ch. XVI, 24).<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-sTTtkrtsxMY/V1FiwaeiDpI/AAAAAAABJiI/8lgKV0hooL0YFuimfabXvL0Yi6tPo_IDgCLcB/s1600/dowDDWWnload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em;
