While Vedanta and the modern quantum\ntheory agrees that it is around 15 billion years.&nbsp; It is amazing that the timeless Vedic\ntradition remains relevant and easily expressible in terms of contemporary\nscientific concepts.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Advaita Vedanta, the\nonly reality is Brahman, the Oneness. All else that exists is surface reality\nof the world around us. Beyond this surface reality lies the true Absolute\nReality, and that is Brahman. Brahman is the only reality of this world and all\nothers have only relative reality.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">'Om Isha vasyam idam\nsarvam, yat kincha jagatyam jagat'<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"All this-\nwhatever exists in this changing universe, is pervaded by consciousness\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">-<b>Isa Upanishad 5000 BC</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;\"Without and within all beings the\nunmoving and also the moving; because of Its subtlety, unknowable; and near and\nfar away is That( brahmAn )\".&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>Bhagavad Gita, Ch.13,Verses 15 : 4000 BC</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Modern science accepted\nconsciousness only after it got shell shocked by the results of the quantum\ndouble slit experiment..&nbsp; Vedanta has\nalways spoken about the importance of the conscious observer. The mystic and\nthe physicist has now arrived at the same conclusion; one starting from the\ninner realm, the other from the outer world.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;No fundamental deficiencies have been found in\nquantum mechanics, since the past 7 decades<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The theory of\nrelativity, and the space-time character of the universe, were perceived by the\nold Indian Rishis in their advanced stage of spiritual consciousness 9000 years\nago.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In their state of higher consciousness they realized that the ultimate\nconstituents of the universe - energy and mass, particle and wave, - were but\ndifferent aspects of the same basic process, but the same Oneness which pervaded\nthe entire universe.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Science, in its most\nadvanced stage, is closer to Vedanta than ever before. The intuition of Indian\nmystics led them to understand the multidimensional reality and of space-time\ncontinuum which is the basis of the modern theory of relativity.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Consciousness is a\nfield embedded at the fundamental level of the universe, with our brains and\nDNA being the transceivers.&nbsp; Our DNA\nwhich can be be influenced by scalar waves and acoustics ( mantras ) can send\nand receive powerful data through the universal network of Akasha. .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Akasha \u2013the\nmorphogenetic consciousness field , as per Vedanta is the source of everything\nthat exists, and in which the memory of the cosmos is encoded. Everything we\nknow, perceive, and imagine, every color, sound, sensation, every thought and\nevery feeling, is a form appearing in the mind. It is all an in-forming of\nconsciousness\u2014mind stuff- or Chitta. .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When the Bhagad&nbsp; Gita says \"The Universe produced\nphenomenally in me, is pervaded by me. . . From me the world is born, in me it\nexists, in me it dissolves.\"&nbsp; It can\nonly be understood if we understand consciousness. This is why the shallow\nminded West who has NO idea of consciousness , thought that the glorious Vedas\nare bumpkin shepherds verses .&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Only\nconsciousness can explain consciousness. We have unlimited and immediate access\nto the radiant field of consciousness which is infinite active universal\nintelligence. Akasha, the mother of all fields\u2014provides the ultimate\nholographic blueprint of the world for all time, past and future. It is this\nthat we tap into when we see the past or future. This is the foundation of\nAstrology.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The brahmAn\n(morphogenetic field) is the reason why a partially formed biological structure\n(the 'morphogentic germ\") gets attached to the morphogentic field of a\nspecies, which then guides the growth of the rest of the form.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Every structure carries its own morphogentic\nfield. If a structure like an organism incorporates sub organisms of different\nnature, then the morphogenetic field of the organism would also incorporate the\nfields of the sub organisms.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The fabric of the\nuniverse, the primal Field, was created by consciousness and is held in\nexistence by consciousness. The entire universe is the consciousness of the\nCreator. Consciousness creates energy, it creates matter, and it creates the\nperspectives of space and time.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The transmission of\nscalar information creates consciousness fields\u2014 Morphogenic Fields. They\ncannot be detected by the usual instruments for measuring electric and magnetic\nfields, which work by interacting with electron flow and energy transmission.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Cells themselves have\nthe ability to perfectly reprogram their own DNA when the external environment\ndemands it. Life is fundamentally electromagnetic than biochemical, the DNA blueprint\nfunctioning as a biohologram which serves as a guiding matrix for organizing\nphysical form.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">DNA can be influenced by acoustic, electromagnetic and scalar\nwaves our DNA can even be \u201cread\u201d or \u201crewritten\u201d as a textual (and acoustic!)\ngenetic code. DNA is a biological Internet that links all human beings.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The concept of the\nmacrocosm as microcosm exists in Vedanta\u2014that the greater divine [light] is\nreflected in the human body\u2014that the spiritual human \u2026 has encoded within it a\ndivine blueprint.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The DNA is a\ntransceiver for the BrahmAn or the morphogenetic consciousness field. The\nCosmic Mind is termed as Hiranyagarbha in Vedanta - and every conscious mind\nbeing an integral part of the Cosmic Mind, becomes vulnerable and sensitive to\nthese cosmic vibrations of thought.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The brain and DNA is\ngoverned by the laws of quantum physics rather than the laws of biology or\nneurophysiology. Scalar waves ( made famous by Nikola Tesla ) is the point of\nfundamental intersection where matter and consciousness influence each other<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Taittiriya\nUpanishad speaks of Maharishi Bhrigu, the son of Varuna, approaching his father\nwith the following prayer:&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u2018Adhihi bhagavo brahmeti. Sir, teach me\nBrahman.\u2019&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Varuna says, \u2018Yato va imani bhutani jayante; yena jatani jivanti; yatprayantyabhisamvishantiti;\ntadvijijnasasva; tadbrahmeti\u201d.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Know That from which all beings originate,\nemerge; That in which all beings rest; and That into which all beings finally\nmerge - That is Brahman.\u2019 (3.1.1)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">TODAY WHEN I LOOK BACK\n, I HAVE A HEARTY LAUGH OVER THE CLAIMS OF THE WHITE MAN THAT WE INDIANS ARE\nHEATHEN SAVAGES.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vedanta says that\nthere's an inner intelligence in your body, and that inner intelligence is\nconsciousness, it's the ultimate\u2026 it's the ultimate in supreme genius, which\nmirrors the wisdom of the universe.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Newton\u2019s classical\nobjective&nbsp; science is devoted only to\nthat which is observed. Soon psychology came along, to the process of\nobservation.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">But western science like Vedanta&nbsp;\nnever devoted itself to who's observing, and a science that does not\ntake into account the observer, who is so fundamental to the observation,\nbecause without the observer there would be no observation - is an incomplete\nand mindless science.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We cannot call it a science; unless we include\nconsciousness. The Upanishads are not philosophy but are darshanas, \u201csomething\nseen\u201d and therefore to be realized.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Consciousness is the\nintelligence, the organizing principle behind the arising of form, unlike what\nDarwin says . The quantum field or pure consciousness is influenced by\nintention and desire.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Consciousness is the intelligent force that started the\nblueprint which ultimately manifested itself as a particular form. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There is a\nconsciousness in every molecule of matter. All atoms in the entire universe are\ncapable of mind reading and communicating with other atoms. The expanded\nabilities of self awareness is abstract reasoning, free will, creativity,\nforesight etc.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the Mahabharata OF\n4000 BC, you see the brahmAn or the morphogenetic consciousness field in\nmotion. Queen Gandhari\u2019s ( mother of Kauravas ) foetus was broken up and put in\n101 mudpots by Maharishi Vyasa . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">These test pots were\ncarefully attended to by trained morphic field resonator parichaarakas for\n'incubating' these test tubes .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is the first\nwritten example of test tube babies and 'stem cell technology' . That the cells\nfrom broken pieces of foetus because of totipotential nature of embryonic cells\ncould be 'cultured ' into compete human forms in a morphogenetic field is\nexpounded here.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">ONE OF THE REASONS WHY\nLORD KRISHNA CAME ON EARTH WAS TO ANIHILLATE&nbsp;&nbsp;\nTHE KAURAVAS \u2013 THE TEST TUBE BABIES.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Morphogenetic fields\nare created by the patterns of physical forms. They help guide the formation of\nlater similar systems where a newly forming system \"tunes into\" a\nprevious system by having within it a \"seed\" that resonates with a similar\nseed in the earlier form.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Science has proven that\nyour hair follicles, dead skin etc\u2026 vibrates with your pattern after it leaves\nyour body from hundreds of miles away.&nbsp;\nThey were able to detect changes in vibrations in case study on of a\nhair follicle that was hundreds of miles away from it owner when his mood\nchanged.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Morphic fields underlie\nthe intelligent organization of proteins, cells, crystals, plants, animals,\nbrains, and minds. They help to explain habits, memories, instincts, telepathy,\nand the sense of direction. The structure of morphic fields depends on what has\nhappened before. They have an inherent memory and imply that many of the\nso-called laws of nature are more like habits.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When fruit fly eggs\nwere exposed to a diethyl ether, some of them developed abnormally, turning\ninto flies with four wings instead of two. When this treatment was repeated\ngeneration after generation, more and more flies developed four wings, even if\ntheir ancestors had never been exposed to the chemical.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When big predators swim\ninto a small fish school, the fish dart quickly to the side in a coordinated\nway in order to clear a path through the middle. They move very fast in\nresponse to quite unexpected stimuli, yet they do not bump into each other.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Upanishads form the\nconcluding portions of the Veda and therefore called the \u201cVedanta\u201d or the end\nof the Veda and contains the essence of Vedic teachings. The Vedas in its\nunchanged unabridged format in Sanskrit verses , have guided the Indian\u2019s\nreligious direction for ages and will continue to do so till our sun goes\nsupernova. .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>THIS BLOG SERIES ON\nSANATANA DHARMA WILL GUIDE THE HINDUS TILL THE SUN GOES SUPERNOVA.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>WE HINDUS HAVE BEEN\nRIDICULED ENOUGH FOR NO REASON.<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Unlike what the shallow\nminded white man thinks , Yoga is to transform the whole man, to discipline his\nbody, to purify his mind, to touch the very foundations of his being.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The sound made while\ndoing the asanas are of paramount importance.. &nbsp;Yoga is not all about driving lymph fluids ,\nwhich do NOT have a pump like for blood.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When Hatha Yoga was\nfirst propagated in North America,&nbsp; there\nwas a lot of prejudice against all things related to HEATHEN and PAGAN\nHinduism.&nbsp; So they left out the critical\nmantra \u2013not knowing that Yoga works only in conjunction with the Sanskrit\nMantras.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mainstream America and\nthe environments&nbsp; in which Yoga classes\nwere held, were not conducive to holding the Indian culture.&nbsp; They wanted to eat the food , but left out\nthe amazing flavour . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The effect of the\nmantra is not produced at the level of reason. The knowledge acquired by the\nrepetition of the mantra extends far beyond the level of reason. In India we\nsay that it is in the depths of consciousness. A big chunk of the Vedas are\nmantras.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mantra functions\naccording to the inner mathematics of cosmic law.&nbsp; It serves to link our individual intelligence\nwith the greater intelligence that pervades all space, extending our awareness\ninto the Infinite and Eternal.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">To chant a mantra at a\ndeeper yogic level is to think with the entire universe and to access the\nwisdom and experience of all beings.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mantra in the yogic\nsense relates to the prime energies, ideas, principles or archetypes of the\ncosmic intelligence that directs the forces of nature and the movements of our\nown minds and hearts.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There are mantric\nsounds that can awaken the higher potentials of the brain and change the flow\nof energy in the nervous system.&nbsp; Each\none of us has a unique sound pattern that sustains all that we do and allows\nour energies to move and grow or stagnate and decline.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ancient Indians knew\nhow to reestablish the lost harmony and rhythm of the body and mind by\nutilizing Shabda BrahmAn.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Our bodies reflect our\ninner state of being by the sounds we utter. If we are in pain, we groan. If we\nare joyful, we hum or sing. If we are sad, we cry. In meditation, we are still.\nJust as sound as born out of silence, sound creates the road back to silence,\ninner harmony and health.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sanskrit is called the\nlanguage of nature because it maintains a correlation between sound and form\ncalled namarupa.&nbsp; This means that the\nsound of the word matches the thing it is describing. The alphabets could be\nseen by the seers in their minds when it was uttered.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sanskrit\u2019s resonant\nfrequencies match the energy centres (chakras) in the subtle body and the\nsounds stimulate, activate, energize and open them.&nbsp; This increases the flow of life force (prana)\nin your mind and body resulting in improved health, strength and heightened\nawareness.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-s3tNJ-6Ma3I/V08agnNr98I/AAAAAAABJdo/cmRRbjVfmBQgz2G5UNSYZDNNofWsEeI6QCLcB/s1600/imahexxxsges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-s3tNJ-6Ma3I/V08agnNr98I/AAAAAAABJdo/cmRRbjVfmBQgz2G5UNSYZDNNofWsEeI6QCLcB/s400/imahexxxsges.jpg\" width=\"398\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The sounds of the\nSanskrit alphabet itself are balancing to the body.&nbsp; In fact, each letter of the alphabet has a\nspecific sound and equivalent vibration, which corresponds to a particular part\nof the body.&nbsp; This is known as the Mantra\nPurusha. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mantra purusha sounds\nalso correspond to 108 kalari marma points , and thus may be chanted while\nstimulating marma points, increasing the healing effect.&nbsp; Mantras may be chanted while performing\nasanas, directing energy to specific areas of the body.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sanskrit is a divine\nlanguage . The cochlea in the inner ear and it has a spiral shape and has three\nand half coils .&nbsp; Kundalini like cochlea\nis coiled and rests at the base of the backbone.&nbsp; Kundalini has three and half coils too. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If cochlea contains\nnerves that connects sound vibrations with the nervous system that generates\nconsciousness-- Kundalini&nbsp; is the&nbsp; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Just as Panini found\nthat the phonological patterning of sounds in the language is a function of\ntheir articulatory properties, so Mendeleev found that the chemical properties\nof elements are a function of their atomic weights.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Just as Panini arranged\nthe sounds in order of increasing phonetic complexity (e.g. with the simple\nstops k,p... preceding the other stops, and representing all of them in\nexpressions like kU, pU) so Mendeleev arranged the elements in order of\nincreasing atomic weights, and called the first row (oxygen, nitrogen, carbon\netc.) \u201ctypical (or representative) elements\u201d. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Just as Panini broke\nthe phonetic parallelism of sounds when the simplicity of the system required\nit, e.g. putting the velar to the right of the labial in the nasal row, so\nMendeleev gave priority to isomorphism over atomic weights when they\nconflicted, e.g. putting beryllium in the magnesium family because it patterns\nwith it even though by atomic weight it seemed to&nbsp; belong with nitrogen and phosphorus.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sri Yantra is the\nchariot of ascension for transporting consciousness to higher dimensions.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Well , well \u2013what do the SHALLOW MINDS know !<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b>CAN THE SHALLOW WHITE MIND, FIGURE OUT WHAT IS IN THE VIDEO ?</b></span><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In ancient India , we\nmade VARNAS \u2013 Brahmins ( thinker \u2013 captain or I ), &nbsp;doers ( Kshatriya \u2013doer ) , skilled workers (\nvaishyas ) and unskilled &nbsp;muscle men &nbsp;( shudras ).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the case of the\nwindlass brake repair tem \u2013 the captain did NOT make the muscle men\nuntouchables . The skilled workers followed the instruction of the Chief\nOfficer . &nbsp;Chief Officer when he got stuck\nwith a technical problem , consulted the captain. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THE CREW WERE VERY\nHAPPY WHEN I GAVE THE TURKISH BOSUN THREE CASES OF BEER.&nbsp; &nbsp;THEY\nNEVER EXPECTED IT.&nbsp; &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">IT WAS A REWARD FOR A\nJOB WELL DONE.&nbsp; THE SHARED THE SPOILS\nAFTER WE SAILED OUT TO SEA WITH ALL\u2014WE HAD A PARTY .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Getting back --<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">While doing a Yoga\nasana , the mantra is a tool for redirecting the energy of the mind within so\nthat we can reclaim our inner composure. It stops the mind chatter.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Try chanting \u2013<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">OM NAMA SHIVAYAH<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Or<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">OM NAMO NARAYANAYAH <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">And check out how your\nmind chatter stops.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Try getting into one of\nthe PRETZEL poses of Yoga and think of something. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">You cannot. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If you can give your\nmind a few seconds of PURE AWARENESS ( state of NO thinking ) you will NOT fall\nill.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The magic of Sabarimala\nlies in PURE AWARENESS within the second and third flash , a period of about 9\nseconds in a field of purified human consciousness ( after 41 days of VRAT ) , will\nevery mind focused at a single point.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Deep rooted phobias and\nvices get amputated. Send all drunken wife beaters to Sabarimala .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When you do Surya\nNamaskar your eyes are focused on the low altitude rising sun. At this time you\nare in a state of NO thinking. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I ASK YOU TO LOOK AT\nTHE SUN AND TRY AND DO SOME THINKING.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Formless meditation is\nhard to achieve directly but becomes easily accessible once one builds the\npower of mantra in the mind.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When we repeat a\nmantra, or do various forms of chanting, a more refined vibration develops and\nbegins to assume the background pattern of our mind, down to a subconscious\nlevel.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mantra practice\ngradually calms and integrates the mind.&nbsp;\nThe mind becomes silent, concentrated and reflective, allowing our\nawareness to vibrate with the mantra.&nbsp;\nThis naturally leads to deeper meditation, in which the mantra may fall\naway.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mantra maintains the\nstrength and integrity of our mental field, so that the mind no longer wanders\noff or loses its composure.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mantra\nsustains the proper circulation of energies in the sphere of the mind, so that\nwe are no longer vulnerable to external conditioning which, after all, is based\nlargely on reactive patterns of words and names.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mantra is the most\nimportant tool for attuning our bodies and minds to their proper resonance,\nwhich is not with the outer world, but with the divine presence that\nconstitutes our own deepest Self.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Unless we learn to\nharmonize our inner sound vibrations, our lives will remain in disharmony and\nsuffering.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">WHY DO AUSTRALIAN BEACH\nBUMS SIT ON BEACHES ?<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THESE ARE UNHAPPY\nPEOPLE , WHO DO NOT LIKE THE ATMOSPHERE OF THEIR OWN HOMES.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There are mantric\nsounds that can awaken the higher potentials of the brain and change the flow\nof energy in the nervous system.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mantra in the yogic\nsense relates to the prime energies, ideas, principles or archetypes of the\ncosmic intelligence that directs the forces of nature and the movements of our\nown minds and hearts. <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sanskrit mantras were\npicked off akashik field by seers in the trances.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The white invader made ridiculous\nmantras in vernacular and got the AGAMA mutts to propagate it.&nbsp; Today in almost all Tamil temples you find\nthem uttering Tamil AGAMA verses\u2014it does NOT work. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The entire BHAKTI MOVEMENT of the fake DASAS (\ncreated and back dated by Jew Rothschild ) were to ridicule Sanskrit mantras\nand substitute ridiculous tribal Awadhi and vernacular verses.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mantra functions\naccording to the inner mathematics of cosmic law.&nbsp; It serves to link our individual intelligence\nwith the greater intelligence that pervades all space, extending our awareness\ninto the Infinite and Eternal.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">To chant\na mantra picked off an akashik field is to think with the entire universe and\nto access the wisdom and experience of all beings.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sound being a\nlongitudinal wave ( like a scalar wave ) has a mystic side.&nbsp; The audible sound (vaikari)&nbsp; is heard by all, but the mystical vibrations\nof mantras ( and its harmonics outside the human audible range) &nbsp;, even though appearing to the ear as ordinary\nsounding syllabifications, are not really \u2019heard.\u2019&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The latter sound ,\ntechnically known as para-vak,&nbsp; is\nconsidered the domain of the advanced 12 strand DNA maharishis.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">OM king mantra ( 7.83\nhertz &nbsp;) is heard by the heart chakra . &nbsp;&nbsp;Our human ear cannot pick up sound less than\n20 hertz\u2014it can only hear the harmonics of OM which are the BEEJ mantras of the\nchakras.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Dissonant sounds create\ndisharmony -- rifts between the individual and her environment, as well as\nwithin the body's own frequencies.&nbsp; If 10\ntuning forks tuned to the same frequency are lined up together and one is struck,\nthey will all begin to reverberate together.&nbsp;\nThis is resonance.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">However, if you strike\na tuning fork of a different frequency and place it near the others, they will\nall stop. This is dissonance.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_19B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; It was emanating from a lotus, which had a baby girl standing on its whorl. When the king returned to the palace with the baby, Queen Kirtida was delighted. She was also shocked that the girl was blind.<br />\n<br />\nLord Krishna\u2019s mother, Yashoda, heard that her best friend Kirtida had a baby, so she came to visit along with her husband and her son. , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"> which produces the magic molecule Nitric Oxide. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nitric oxide is a gas\nthat affects blood vessels.&nbsp; It is a\nsimple molecule, having two atoms - nitrogen and oxygen.&nbsp; But it does an incredible array of things.&nbsp; Our blood vessels make nitric oxide. It's a\npotent and facile dilator. <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-ojB_xIWcROM/V1ASkG5QJYI/AAAAAAABJfk/zgLJfOkL3QgQVM71fsDCRoO3nViS6NllACLcB/s1600/Soul-Evolutee3ion-DNA-Activation-Attunement.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"634\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-ojB_xIWcROM/V1ASkG5QJYI/AAAAAAABJfk/zgLJfOkL3QgQVM71fsDCRoO3nViS6NllACLcB/s640/Soul-Evolutee3ion-DNA-Activation-Attunement.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When the human body\nreaches the age of 27 years, the secretion of nitric oxide is at its peak. As\nyou get&nbsp; older and the production of\nnitric oxide in the human body declines gradually, more from age 42 onwards. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nitric oxide controls\nblood flow in our body.&nbsp; It controls our\nvascular resistance , the blood pressure . When your body produces sufficient\namounts of Nitric oxide, then your blood vessels are relaxed, and your blood\npressure is low.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-mJhN8YHtTRc/V1AQZpO4vsI/AAAAAAABJfE/hui8WUFL484itB7tCpU_f9zEI5bAetZkwCLcB/s1600/imffeages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"208\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-mJhN8YHtTRc/V1AQZpO4vsI/AAAAAAABJfE/hui8WUFL484itB7tCpU_f9zEI5bAetZkwCLcB/s400/imffeages.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Conversely if you're\nnot making enough or Nitric Oxide production is inactivated,&nbsp; then&nbsp;\nyour blood vessels become contracted and your blood pressure shoots\nup.&nbsp; So this is an important feature of\nthe blood vessels is its&nbsp; ability to\ncontrol its own diameter automatically. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nitric oxide is part of\nthe body's self-defense mechanism.It can defend against bacteria.&nbsp; It also defends against tumor cells.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nitric Oxide in higher concentrations can\nactually halt the growth of cells or can halt bacterial growth, so it's a\ndefense against infection. Macrophages, certain cells of the immune system,\nproduce Nitric oxide in order to kill invading bacteria.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-72mFI62mqhY/V1ARCp1BHGI/AAAAAAABJfM/k93LSsa5RtMH5LrgYVpLjOyKHU_dSvv6ACLcB/s1600/tuning%2Bfork%2Beeeresonance%2Bvibration.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"282\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-72mFI62mqhY/V1ARCp1BHGI/AAAAAAABJfM/k93LSsa5RtMH5LrgYVpLjOyKHU_dSvv6ACLcB/s400/tuning%2Bfork%2Beeeresonance%2Bvibration.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is a defense against\ntumor and cancer. It is a defense against hardening of the arteries too.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Nitric oxide - is our self-defense system\nagainst athrosclerosis.&nbsp; The endothelial\nlining of the blood vessel is like Teflon.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It keeps things from sticking to the vessel wall.&nbsp; The reason it has this property of Teflon is\nbecause it releases nitric oxide, so it's a non-sticky surface because it's\nreleasing nitric oxide, which not only relaxes the blood vessel but also\nprevents things from sticking to the vessel.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;\n<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-K3HhspUkyRU/V1AQG3UVLfI/AAAAAAABJe8/zwOVkEdgZm4HMFH5JHNTy3xum8ZiRjRpQCLcB/s1600/forreeweall.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"424\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-K3HhspUkyRU/V1AQG3UVLfI/AAAAAAABJe8/zwOVkEdgZm4HMFH5JHNTy3xum8ZiRjRpQCLcB/s640/forreeweall.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nitric oxide also\nserves as a neurotransmitter between nerve cells, part of its general role in\nredox signaling. Unlike most other neurotransmitters that only transmit\ninformation from a presynaptic to a postsynaptic neuron, the small, uncharged,\nand fat-soluble nitric oxide molecule can diffuse widely and readily enters\ncells.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-8zfHJlrI2SA/V1ARZKcKB0I/AAAAAAABJfU/i5cjKn0ZnYAG3CU8m4q0kRAxdzoK0tfqwCLcB/s1600/vmmho3dsme1.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"326\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-8zfHJlrI2SA/V1ARZKcKB0I/AAAAAAABJfU/i5cjKn0ZnYAG3CU8m4q0kRAxdzoK0tfqwCLcB/s640/vmmho3dsme1.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nitric oxide is an\nimportant neurotransmitter in various parts of the gastrointestinal tract. It\ncauses relaxation of the gastrointestinal smooth muscle. In the stomach it\nincreases the capacity of the fundus to store food and fluids. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nitric oxide acts on cardiac muscle to\ndecrease contractility and heart rate. Nitric oxide contributes to the\nregulation of cardiac contractility.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The relationship\nbetween sound and consciousness has been recorded in India's Hindu scriptures\n7000 years ago.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-Gvse9Pi59_M/V1APLKrgomI/AAAAAAABJes/IAxytdyORRQh0QsWmL930EtpdjHlmL6KQCLcB/s1600/vmmhoDDEme4.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>niranjana padam yati\nnitam yatra parayanah</i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"Salutations to\nthe nadam, which is the inner guide and the inner life, the dispenser of\nhappiness to all!&nbsp; It is the inner guru,\nappearing as nada, bindu and kala.&nbsp; One\nwho is devoted to the inner guru, the nada, the inner music, obtains the\nhighest bliss.\" -&nbsp; Hatha Yoga\nPradipika IV, 1<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Music is a painting on the canvas\nof silence. If every sound on this cosmos and planet earth were simultaneously\nrecorded, there would be only one single sound OM.&nbsp;&nbsp; Nada is not a part of dhvani (external\nsound).&nbsp; Rather dhvani instead arises as\na projection of nada.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">THIS POST IS NOW CONTINUED TO PART 37, BELOW</span></b></div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"background-color: lime;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/06/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_3.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/06/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_3.html</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c682528035809198360\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; line-height: 22.4px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_142M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil<br />\nDecember 29, 2017 at 5:18 AM<br />\n<br />\nBEFORE THE WHITE INVADER CAME TO INDIA--<br />\n<br />\nFULL MOON DAY ( POORNIMA ) AND THREE DAYS FOLLOWING IT..<br />\n<br />\nAND ..<br />\n<br />\nNEW MOON DAY ( AMAVASYA ) -- AND THREE DAYS FOLLOWING IT..<br />\n<br />\nWERE HOLIDAYS --FOR FASTING ..<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/10/amavasya-poornima-ekadashi-fasting.html<br />\n<br />\nSIX FIXED HOLIDAYS IN A MONTH\u2026<br />\n<br />\nIF YOU DO THIS TODAY IN MODERN TIMES--AND EAT ORGANIC FOOD , YOU WILL NOT GET CANCER..<br />\n<br />\nWHEN THE EVIL WHITE INVADER-- BASTARD-- CAME TO INDIA-- HE MADE US WORSE THAN MONKEYS BY MAKING US FAST ON WRONG MEANINGLESS DATES ..<br />\n<br />\nBY 1947 JEW ROTHSCHILD CREATED HUNDREDS OF FAKE MUTTS IN INDIA. \u2026 HE MADE THE PONTIFFS OF THE 4 ORIGINAL MUTTS CRYPTO JEWS WITH PALE EYES --STOPPING THE 4000 YEAR OLD TRADITION OK KERALA NAMBOODIRIS HEADING THE 4 ORIGINAL MUTTS ..<br />\n<br />\nTHE POST ABOVE IS THE REPEAT THE MOST IMPORTANT FOR 1.1 BILLION HINDUS ON THIS PLANET..<br />\n<br />\nSPRING TIDES ARE STRONGEST THREE DAYS-- REPEAT ---THREE DAYS AFTER FULL MOON AND NEW MOON..<br />\n<br />\nTides are long-period waves that roll around the planet as the ocean is \"pulled\" back and forth by the gravitational pull of the moon and the sun as these bodies interact with the Earth in their monthly and yearly orbits\u2026<br />\n<br />\nDuring full or new moons\u2014which occur when the Earth, sun, and moon are nearly in alignment\u2014average tidal ranges are slightly larger. ..This occurs twice each month. ..<br />\n<br />\nThe moon appears new (dark) when it is directly between the Earth and the sun. The moon appears full when the Earth is between the moon and the sun. In both cases, the gravitational pull of the sun is \"added\" to the gravitational pull of the moon on Earth, causing the oceans to bulge a bit more than usual. This means that high tides are a little higher and low tides are a little lower than average.<br />\n<br />\nSpring tides, has nothing to do with the season of spring. Rather, the term is derived from the concept of the tide \"springing forth.\" ..<br />\n<br />\nSpring tides occur twice each lunar month all year long, without regard to the season\u2026.<br />\n<br />\nhttp://tides.mobilegeographics.com/calendar/month/547.html<br />\n<br />\nIN THE LINK ABOVE YOU CAN SEE THAT FULL MOON IS ON 3RD DEC 2017..<br />\n<br />\nTHREE DAYS LATER THE DATE IS 6TH DEC..<br />\n<br />\nTHE HIGH TIDE ( SPRING ) IS 12.5 METRES --THE HIGHEST..<br />\n<br />\nJEW ROTHSCHILD TOOK AWAY INDIANS TO WORK AS INDENTURED LABOUR.. HE CUT THEM OFF CULTURALLY FROM INDIA BY INTRODUCING FAKE FESTIVALS AT FAKE DATES ..<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/04/indentured-coolie-slavery-reinvented.html<br />\n<br />\nIF CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL WAS NOT BORN ON THIS PLANET..-- HINDUS WOULD HAVE NEVER EVER KNOW ABOUT THIS HUMONGOUS DECEIT\u2026 THIS IS WHY I STARTED THIS BLOGSITE ..<br />\n<br />\nHUMAN BODY AND BRAIN IS FULL OF WATER --AND SPRING TIDES AFFECT US..<br />\n<br />\nWater covers 70 percent of Earth\u2019s surface, makes up 66% of the human body. Brain is 83% water, blood-92%, kidneys - 82%, liver-69% , muscles-75%, bones-28%...<br />\n<br />\nIn my language Malayalam and in Sanskrit Kapha, Pitta and Vata means the same. Kapha is mucous , Pitta is bile and Vata means vayu or fart ( flatulence ). ..<br />\n<br />\nWHEN YOU FAST YOU BALANCE THE TRI DOSHAS..<br />\n<br />\nMost Hindus observe fast on Purnima and Amavasya. ..<br />\n<br />\nPeople who fast SERIOUSLY continue till the third day when the water pull/ push in human cells is highest . ..<br />\n<br />\nThese three days Hindus fast or take light veggie food rich in Magnesium\u2026<br />\n<br />\nFasting is done to reduce the acidic content in our system and to slow down the metabolic rates\u2026 This restores the body and mind balance. ..Meditation helps in centering your body, mind and soul\u2026<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2\u2014</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_141BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; When the body is not cleansing properly, this process is impaired and instead you wake up tired and lethargic . There is a higher sodium content in the cell, therefore a higher hydrogen (acidifying) content, and as water follows sodium in the body, the water content of the cell starts to swell. ..<br />\n<br />\nSo the cell is under pressure from high acidity \u2013 so it pulls in more calcium, which displaces more magnesium causing an imbalance\u2026<br />\n<br />\nThe moon-pull is much gentler than the sun-push. Only if conditions are right within the body can the moon pull the sodium back across the cell membrane, thus making way for the Magnesium to exert a gentle push with the potassium, so that they go back to their rightful position, which is inside the cell\u2026<br />\n<br />\nWhat is lymph? gobble them up; strip them for parts; and use the resulting molecules for energy or to make new cell parts.<br />\n<br />\nAutophagy makes us more efficient machines to get rid of faulty parts, stop cancerous growths, and stop metabolic dysfunction like obesity and diabetes.. the process plays a hand in controlling inflammation and immunity.<br />\n<br />\nTHE MOST IMPORTANT EFFECT IS THAT THE BRAIN GETS SHARPENED AND THE AGEING PROCESS SLOWS DOWN<br />\n<br />\nhttps://www.youtube.com/watch?v=10jNZleNH9w<br />\n<br />\nFROM NOW ON HINDUS WILL CREATE THEIR OWN DESTINY--WE DONT CARE FOR THE WHITE MEN WHO FOOLED US USING AGENTS LIKE GANDHI AND BR AMBEDKAR\u2026<br />\n<br />\nCapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_139MN\" kind=\"m\"></span></div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_139B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 16px;
