Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/05/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_29.html?showComment=1464666074477#c3315206449032766634\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">May 31, 2016 at 9:11 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_91MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1-<br />\n<br />\nIn Hindusim we call the MALE- purusha and FEMALE- pragati.<br />\n<br />\nSometimes for purposes of the Kundalini raise MALE is SHIVA and FEMALE is Shakti ( Parvati ).<br />\n<br />\n4000 years ago Adi Shankaracharya wrote \u2013<br />\nShivah Shakthyaa Yuktho Yadi Bhavathi Shakthaha Prabhavithum<br />\nNa Chedevam Devo Na Khalu Kushalaha Sphandithumapi<br />\n<br />\nTranslation Verse No 1 : Shiva becomes capable of creating the Universe, only when united with Shakthi , but otherwise , He is incapable of even a stir.<br />\n<br />\nIn the Tantric cosmology, the whole universe is perceived as being created, penetrated and sustained by two fundamental forces, which are permanently in a perfect, indestructible UNION. These forces or universal aspects are called Shiva and Shakti.<br />\n<br />\nIn Hinduism we have placed the female on a pedestal . No man can do a yagam if he is a bachelor or a widower.<br />\n<br />\nEach of the trinity gods are powerless without their consorts.<br />\n<br />\nTantric art has captured the images of the Purusha and his consort, Pragati, in ecstatic union. This is NOT perverted sex.<br />\n<br />\nPurusha and Pragati is expressed as Shiva and Shakti in the same body 50:50 \u2013 this is NOT a she boy or a transgender . It is a mindboggling, intelligent concept.<br />\n<br />\nNOW IN CALCUTTA THE DROHI COMMIES ARE MAKING HIJRA (TRANSGENDER) DURGA STATUES FOR DURGA PUJA.<br />\n<br />\nPurusha is the embodiment of pure consciousness, and Pragati as the embodiment of pure energy.<br />\n<br />\nBoth Shiva and Shakti are Consciousness---- Shiva is the changeless static aspect of Consciousness, and Shakti is the kinetic, active aspect of the same Consciousness.<br />\n<br />\nThrough uniting with Purusha , Pragati gave form to his spirit and created the universe.(we are talking about CREATION OF THE COSMOS here- not street side sex as figured out by small minds)<br />\n<br />\nWhen the insentient Prakriti comes in contact with the sentient Purusha , the universe evolves.<br />\n<br />\nPurusha symbolizes consciousness, the masculine principle. Pragati symbolizes the feminine principle, the activating energy. Sometimes at home I wonder how myself and my wife are like this concept.<br />\n<br />\nThe cosmos in all its manifestations, as an act of love. The relationship between say- Shakti and Shiva is the dance of consciousness and energy experienced within each of us, regardless of gender.<br />\n<br />\nShiva resides in the highest Sahasr\u0101ra Chakra and Shakti in the lowest M\u016bl\u0101dh\u0101ra Chakra. When Prakriti and Purusha unite in the Sahasr\u0101ra Chakra ( raising of Kundalini ) , knowledge, knower and the object of knowledge become one.<br />\n<br />\nSankhya thus is a theory of evolution and understanding the universe. Prakriti cannot be perceived, not because of its non-existence, but because of its subtlety. It is perceived in its effects.<br />\n<br />\nThe eternal and indestructible union between Shiva and Shakti gives birth to the whole Macrocosm, in its stable, static aspect as well as in its dynamic one. Not only is Shakti responsible for creation, it is also the agent of all change<br />\n<br />\nShakti is manifested by Shiva only during creation and is withdrawn into himself at the end of creation. This is for the perceptive.<br />\n<br />\nModern science repeats from our Vedas that matter and energy are interchangeable. So does consciousness and energy . In the highest planes they are interchangeable, which is why we see a great incongruence between our spiritual experiences and the external reality.<br />\n<br />\nALL THIS IS BEYOND THE SHALLOW MINDS OF THE WHITE MAN WHO WROTE THAT SHIVA AS ARDHANEESHWARA IS A SHE -MALE EUNUCH.<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 3-</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_91MN\" kind=\"m\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_91BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_91B_box\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_92B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; border-bottom-width: 0px; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c2391973825166941951\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_92M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">Capt. That is called the blissful Shakti from which creation arises.<br />\n<br />\nThere is no Shiva without Shakti, nor Shakti without Shiva.\"<br />\n<br />\nSamkhya as you can see was a masterpiece of modeling the ways of the inner universe.<br />\n<br />\nThe union of Shakti with Shiva by Kundalini rise is the liberation of seeker from the cycle of endless birth and death.<br />\n<br />\nABOVE CONCEPT HAS BEEN CONSTRUED AS THE RIDICULOUS ADAM AND EVE CONCEPT .<br />\n<br />\nIT IS HIGH TIME , WE INDIANS CARE A FUCK FOR LYING INDOPHILES LIKE WENDY DONIGER , SHELDON POLLOCK ETC<br />\n<br />\nNO WISE MAN WILL BARK BACK AT A DOG OR A BITCH IN HEAT . &nbsp; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">\u201c\nEVERY SINGLE IDEA IS COPIED NAY STOLEN FROM VEDANTA . font-size: 14pt; line-height: 115%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/01/sabarimala-makara-vilakku-makara.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/01/sabarimala-makara-vilakku-makara.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 115%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/04/thrissur-pooram-festival-mother-of-all.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/04/thrissur-pooram-festival-mother-of-all.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\">NOW YOGA IS ALSO BEING HIJACKED THE SAME WAY.<o:p></o:p></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\">Yoga is almost a 30 billion dollar industry in\nthe west. &nbsp;More and more white men and women have turned to Yoga. <o:p></o:p></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\">Almost all these western Christian people wrote in\ntheir wills that they want to be CREMATED and not BURIED.<o:p></o:p></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\">The Pope got a whiff of this truth and he\nalmost got a stroke.</span></b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In a 25 page letter titled\n\u201dLetter to the Bishops of the Catholic Church on Some Aspects of Christian\nMeditation,\u201d issued by the Vatican Congregation of the Doctrine of the Faith authorized\nby Pope John Paul II, warned Christians against \u201cspiritual dangers deriving\nfrom Hindu methods of contemplative meditation used in yoga\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The letter warned \u201c the\nsymbolism and body postures in such meditation can even become an idol and thus\nan obstacle to the raising up of the spirit of God.\u201d <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It warned that to give\n\u201da symbolic significance typical of the mystical experience\u201d to sensations of\nwell-being from meditation can lead to \u201da kind of mental schizophrenia which\ncould also lead to psychic disturbance and, at times, to moral deviations.\u201d <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The letter analyzed the\nhistory and significance of Christian prayer and stressed the need to stick by\nits established methods. \u201dMany Christians today have a keen desire to learn how\nto experience a deeper and authentic prayer life despite the not inconsiderable\ndifficulties which modern culture places in the way of the need for silence,\nrecollection and meditation,\u201d the document said. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201dThe interest which in\nrecent years has been awakened also among some Christians by forms of\nmeditation associated with some Eastern religions and their particular methods\nof prayer is a significant sign of this need for spiritual recollection and a\ndeep contact with the divine mystery,\u201d it said.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201dThe Eastern masters\nthemselves have noted that not everyone is equally suited to make use of this\nsymbolism, since not everybody is able to pass from the material sign to the\nspiritual reality that is being sought,\u201d the letter to the bishops said.\n\u201dUnderstood in an inadequate and incorrect way, the symbolism can even become\nan idol, and thus an obstacle to the raising up of the spirit of God,\u201d it said.\n<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-hI0d9E7ZnX0/V01WuPj885I/AAAAAAABJYY/_qN1-yPeLmUuQDt2ZTzCIZxf0st_49_CACLcB/s1600/929EE9327_orig.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-hI0d9E7ZnX0/V01WuPj885I/AAAAAAABJYY/_qN1-yPeLmUuQDt2ZTzCIZxf0st_49_CACLcB/s1600/929EE9327_orig.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201dTo live out in one\u2019s\nprayer the full awareness of one\u2019s body as a symbol is even more difficult: it\ncan degenerate into a cult of the body and can lead surreptitiously to\nconsidering all body sensations as spiritual experiences\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Yoga can\n\"degenerate into a cult of the body\" that debases Christian prayer.\n\"The love of God, the sole object of Christian contemplation, is a reality\nwhich cannot be \u2018mastered\u2019 by any method or technique,\"<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-YJP4aklO0QY/V01XAUGWvtI/AAAAAAABJYc/EtPhu-1eqAwuUAIwY8Z5avcfgw7oMQyHACLcB/s1600/dowddenload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-YJP4aklO0QY/V01XAUGWvtI/AAAAAAABJYc/EtPhu-1eqAwuUAIwY8Z5avcfgw7oMQyHACLcB/s400/dowddenload.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nSO NOW THE POPEs AGENTS HAVE INVENTED CHRISTIAN YOGA.&nbsp;&nbsp;</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nTHE YOGA MANUAL SAYS NOTHING ABOUT THE\nORIGINS OF YOGA IN INDIA. &nbsp;IT OMITS THE WORD HINDU.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<b style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><br /></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<b style=\"background-color: cyan;\">THE POPE MUST KNOW THAT TILL THE WHITE MAN INVADED INDIA HE\nHAD NO INVENTIONS AND DISCOVERIES TO HIS NAME.&nbsp;\n<o:p></o:p></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<b style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><br /></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<b style=\"background-color: cyan;\">ALL ANCIENT GREEK AND WESTRN KNOWLEDGE WAS STOLEN FROM INDIA\nBY PEOPLE WHO CAME ALL THE WAY TO INDIA TO STUDY IT.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<b style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><br /></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<b style=\"background-color: cyan;\">THE ARAB KNOWLEDGE LIFTED BY THE WEST WAS \u201cTRANSLATED INTO\nARABIC KNOWLEDGE\u201d SOLD IN GOLD FROM KODUNGALLUR UNIVERSITY.</b><o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/04/apollonius-or-jesus-christ-who-is-real.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/04/apollonius-or-jesus-christ-who-is-real.html</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;\u201dThis NEW religious reawakening includes some\nvery ambiguous elements which are incompatible with the Christian faith,\u201d the\npope said. \u201dTheir syncretistic and immanent outlook (tends to) relativize\nreligious doctrine in favor of a vague world view expressed as a system of\nmyths and symbols dressed in religious language\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;
